name: OnePlus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic, Bombastic Bass - 12.4 Mm Drivers, 10 Mins Charge - 20 Hrs...
reviews:
[{'name': 'Ashish Shende', 'title': 'ANC not applicable for IPhones', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 22 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Model name: BWZ-2 ANCColour: Grand Green', 'review_body': 'I bought these headphones for Rs.1999 and I have been using them for about 2 weeks now. I‚Äôm impressed with sound quality, battery life and ease of use of the wireless bands. They are perfect for listening to music, podcast and calls on the go.

The sound quality of these earphones is very good, especially for the price. The earphones can handle a variety of genres, from rock to pop to classical. They also have a customizable bass feature with the earphones app, which lets you adjust the bass level to your preference.

The comfort of these earphones is also very good. They are lightweight, and the ear pads are soft and cushiony. They fit snugly on my ears, but cause discomfort after long sessions. They also have a speed charge feature, which gives you good playtime with just 10 minutes of charging. The battery life is amazing, as they can last up to 28 hours on a single charge. The headphones also have a built-in microphone, which works well for calls and voice commands. The buttons are easy to access and control the volume, playback, and calls.

The only drawbacks of these earphones are that they don‚Äôt have active noise cancellation applicable on iPhone. However, these are minor issues, and they don‚Äôt affect the overall performance and value of these earphones. They are still very good at blocking out most of the ambient noise.

I would highly recommend these headphones to anyone who is looking for a pair of wireless earphones that offer great sound quality, comfort, battery life, and features for a reasonable price. They are suitable for casual and everyday use, and they can handle any kind of music or content. They are one of the best earphones I have ever owned, and I give them a 4.0-star rating out of 5.
Read more'}, {'name': 'Vishal', 'title': 'READ IT AND THEN BUY', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 5 March 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Model name: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2Colour: Black', 'review_body': 'There is nothing wrong with the looks of the Bullets Z2, they are actually quite decent looking. They are just a neckband, and this is what neckbands look like, and we have made our peace with it. The middle part is a thicker, slightly more stiff, U shaped-silicon band, with two chunky pill-shaped units at the end. The wires stem from these pills and have earbuds on the end. One of these pill-shaped units houses the battery, while the other has control options and the USB Type C port on the side. You get volume buttons on this control unit and a multi-function play/pause button. The battery unit has the OnePlus branding and the logo, while the volume buttons are highlighted in red.

The earbuds on the end are pretty standard, with eartips on one side and a flat back with magnets. When the buds are attached together, they will simply stop playing the audio, which you can resume once you put them back in. The Bullets Wireless Z2 are quite light and can be worn around the neck all day without ever feeling like a burden. The material used is quite skin-friendly and feels quite sturdy as well. It also comes with an IP55 rating.
Pairing the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2 is a pretty fuss-free process. All you have to do is press and hold the play/pause button, and the buds will go into pairing mode. You can then look up the buds in the list of Bluetooth pairings on your device and connect the buds. Once connected, the Bullets Z2 will connect to your phone automatically once you put them on.

You get the usual volume buttons on the buds and another button in the middle in terms of controls. Now instead of simply sharing the command load amongst its button comrades, OnePlus has put all the burden on this one button in the middle. Apart from the usual pairing/play/ pause/ call receiving/ call ending functions (which are already a lot for a single button), OnePlus has also made it responsible for changing tracks. You have to press the button twice to skip to the next song and thrice to go back to the last song. It may all sound simple but can actually be chaotic in practice as you have to keep track of how many times you have pressed that tiny button before the command is completed.

The OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2 comes with the biggest drivers seen on a pair of OnePlus earphones- 12.4mm. The fact that OnePlus is offering such big drivers for under two thousand rupees is a major plus point for the buds. The earbuds support two audio codecs, SBC and AAC.

As for the audio performance, the Bullets Wireless Z2 are pretty loud and come with plenty of bass, something that seems to be every brand‚Äôs audio formula in the budget segment. While this kind of signature sound gives the audio some faux body, it actually fails to deliver what the audio is truly supposed to sound like.
If you are someone looking for a pair of earphones that offer balanced sound, then you might not like the sound profile that the Bullets Wireless Z2 offer as they lack balance, majorly.

That said, if you are someone who likes bass-heavy audio output and do not mind if some bass sneaks into your mids, then the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2 will definitely be your cup of tea.

The OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2 were pretty good in terms of call quality. We could hear the speaker clearly, and we heard no complaints whatsoever regarding our audio quality while using the buds. As the buds fit deep into your ear canals, they offer really good passive noise cancellation.

They come with big 12.4 mm drivers, offer really long battery life, have a bass-heavy signature sound, and have a really solid build. But because the earbuds are really bass-heavy, they lack balance, and for those who like to listen to melodious or classical music, these might not be a great option.
The Bullets Wireless Z2 also face some heat from the likes of Oppo Enco M32 and the Realme Buds 2, which are priced in the same vicinity. The OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2 are actually a great proposition for the price; you only need to have a liking for bass.
Read more'}, {'name': 'Amazon Customer', 'title': 'Good neckband', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 14 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Model name: BWZ-2 ANCColour: Booming Black', 'review_body': 'The neckband could be more sturdy of harder material. Sound quality very good. Overall features are great. ANC works very well. But I think it is little over priced.'}, {'name': 'Gaurav Dhingra', 'title': 'excellent sound quality, convenient ireless connectivity, and a long battery life', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 12 January 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Model name: BWZ-2Colour: Jazz Green', 'review_body': 'I recently purchased the OnePlus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic in the stunning Jazz Green color and I have been blown away by the performance of these earphones.

First and foremost, the sound quality is exceptional. The 12.4 mm drivers deliver bombastic bass that adds depth and richness to my music. I have tried a variety of genres, from pop to hip-hop to classical, and these earphones have handled them all with ease. The vocals are clear and the instrumentals are well-balanced, creating an immersive listening experience.

The wireless feature is a game changer for me. I no longer have to deal with tangled wires or worry about accidentally pulling the earphones out of my ears. The Bluetooth connectivity is strong and I have not experienced any interruptions or dropouts while listening to music or taking calls.

Another impressive feature is the quick charge. With just 10 minutes of charging, I can get up to 20 hours of music playback, which is perfect for those times when I forget to charge them overnight. The battery life itself is also impressive, with up to 30 hours of music playback on a full charge.

The design of the earphones is sleek and comfortable. They fit securely in my ears and do not cause any discomfort even after extended use. The mic also works well, allowing me to take calls without having to take off the earphones.

I also appreciate the attention to detail in the packaging. The earphones come with a stylish and compact carrying case, making it easy to bring them with me on-the-go. The Jazz Green color is also a nice touch, adding a pop of color to my accessories.

Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of the OnePlus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones. They offer excellent sound quality, convenient ireless connectivity, and a long battery life, all at an affordable price. I highly recommend these earphones to anyone in the market for a high-quality and stylish pair of wireless earphones.
Read more'}]

name: boAt Airdopes 121v2 in-Ear True Wireless Earbuds with Upto 14 Hours Playback, 8MM Drivers, Battery Indicators, Lightweight...
reviews:
[{'name': 'Wrickzy', 'title': 'A overall good product but seemingly incompetent due to irregular battery and charging pattern', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 10 February 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Mint CascadeStyle Name: 50 Hours', 'review_body': "I have tried several earbuds in the <1500Rs price segment and without a doubt it is a good earbud for the price you pay but it has its own set of pros and cons. So, without further ado the pros and the cons of the product according to me are: (** marked points are important features/downsides of this earphone)
Pros:
**1. Sound and Bass: The sound and bass of this earbud are exceptionally good for the price. The sound and the bass can even be tuned by an EQ to suit your audio needs from your phone but in windows, I still haven't found a way to change EQ without using some third party software.
2. Waterproof: Yes it is water proof but up to a certain water level and for a certain duration.
3. Design: This point is debatable for this earbud because of its large upper part. Though it sits comfortably in your ear but it has a tendency to come loose due to certain jerking of the head.
**4. Battery backup of each earbud: By far the best thing for this earbud. The battery backup is impressive. Even after using it for 6hrs at 60% volume, the battery remaining was 40%. The battery remaining percentage is shown both in mobiles as well as in windows.
5. Codecs: It supports both SBC and AAC codecs but switching to AAC codec will rapidly deplete your phone's battery (if you are on android especially).
6. USB C charging and digital display for remaining charge: Though it is of mere importance, but the digital display do provide an estimated percentage of charge remaining, while the LEDs used to power the display consume battery from the case. The USB C charging is a good feature though it takes around 30-45mins to charge the case fully.
7. Bluetooth connection: The connection is pretty fast. The fast pairing is also fast and after that you just need to open the case and take out the earbud and you are all set.

Cons:
1. Sound Distortion: At volume >90% you will definitely find the sound a bit distorted but this con can be overlooked as one wouldn't be using the earphone at that volume for long purposes.
**2. Case battery backup: This is the worst part of the whole earbud. It is claimed that the case offers an additional 32hours backup, but I found that the case was only able to charge both the earphones 1 time at max before having to charge the case again. So considering it charges both the earpods once, it comes down to 16hours of additional battery backup (effectively 8 hours if you use both of them at the same time)
3. Noise Cancellation: The earpods sounded great when I was using it in a less crowdy place (like a small room) than when used in place full of people and background noise (like travelling in a car/train/metro/bus etc). While travelling in a car, though I was using the earpod at about 90% of the maximum volume, still I could hear all outside noises and the bass and the sound of the playing song created a pandemonium.
**4. Charging the earbuds: Though the earbuds charge rather quickly once kept inside the case, but most of the times the case fails to recognize the earbuds. This is another serious issue of this earbud. I have 2 of these earbuds (in green and blue color) and both exhibit this same characteristic. You have to recheck whether it started charging or not every time you put an earbud inside the case because there is no guarantee that the case will recognize and start charging the earbud. Also, you will have to regularly clean the charge points of the earbuds and the case because even a pinch of dust can keep the case from recognizing the earbud (None of my other earbuds exhibited this problem). Also the earbud gets extremely hot when charging. So, you shouldn't immediately start using the earbuds right after charging.
**5.Mic: Although it has quad-mic system, I found the quality of the mic to be pretty bad. Also, you will have to speak louder for the person on the other end of the phone to actually hear you.
6. Case discharge issue: In this case, if you start charging the headphones, almost all the time the case keeps on charging the earbuds even when the charging is complete and dissipates all it's charge. Both the earbuds I possess have this same issue.

Conclusion: In conclusion, I would say that it is a decent buy if you are looking for an earbud under Rs1500. Considering the bass and sound it offers and also the battery of each earbud it provides, it is a value for money product.

Had to return the product once cause it was not being connected. Now it has been only 1 month and only the single piece is working. Now I want to claim the warranty and I am unable to find the guidelines."}, {'name': 'Pallavi', 'title': 'Product is good but when you attend a call that time it‚Äôs not audible properly.', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 13 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Active BlackStyle Name: 14 hours', 'review_body': 'Not that much good'}, {'name': 'Diszsurya', 'title': 'Not worthy for this product', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 14 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Royal BlueStyle Name: 50 Hours', 'review_body': "I bought BOAT airdopes 121pro yesterday under 1000/- and first problem is when I called to another person they said that my voice is too low without any traffic and when in traffic it's not lowering or suppression the traffic sound and even worse and when I connected it to laptop and cellphone I have to increase volume to full so that I can able to hear that song or movie... Not suppressing sound while in traffic and when we called to others, our voice is too low for them unable to hear our voice"}, {'name': 'V P', 'title': 'Not proper working', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 28 January 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Active BlackStyle Name: 14 hours', 'review_body': 'One side s not working'}, {'name': 'Hussain D V', 'title': 'Basic level value for money', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 19 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Active BlackStyle Name: Classic', 'review_body': "I like this product very much because the quality is ok something seems to be better for the money so I have used it well and now it is fine but what is the problem once it fell down but once again I will use it again so don't worry value for money only If you want the basic level of features but what is missing, you can definitely buy it"}]

name: Redmi A1 (Black, 2GB RAM, 32GB Storage) | Segment Best AI Dual Cam | 5000mAh Battery | Leather Texture Design | Android 12
reviews:
[{'name': 'Bhavana', 'title': 'Popular product from Redmi', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 28 September 2022', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': 'If you r searching for budget smart phone, this phone is the ideal choice. This suits for those already having a smart phone with sufficient storage and camera with larger pixels. After using for 6 days writing this review.
Pros :
1) Stock android (at this price range is welcomed)

Cons :

name: OnePlus 11R 5G (Galactic Silver, 16GB RAM, 256GB Storage)
reviews:
[{'name': 'Vishal Shivapujimath', 'title': 'Go for it', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 9 August 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 16GB RAM, 256GB StorageColour: Sonic Black', 'review_body': "I recently embarked on a journey to upgrade my smartphone, and the OnePlus 11R 5G 256GB model purchased from Amazon has proven to be an exceptional choice. This device combines cutting-edge technology, remarkable performance, and the convenience of Amazon's reliable service, resulting in a seamless and satisfying purchasing experience.

Effortless Ordering and Expedited Delivery:
Purchasing the OnePlus 11R 5G 256GB from Amazon was a breeze. The user-friendly interface allowed me to navigate through the available options and place my order with ease. I opted for expedited delivery, and true to Amazon's reputation, the package arrived promptly and in pristine condition, well before the expected delivery date.

Impressive Design and Build Quality:
Upon unboxing the OnePlus 11R, I was immediately captivated by its sleek and elegant design. The device's premium construction exudes a sense of sophistication and modernity. Its slim profile and well-crafted chassis make it comfortable to hold, while the attention to detail in its build quality instills confidence in its durability.

Vivid Display and 5G Connectivity:
The OnePlus 11R's display is nothing short of stunning. The vibrant colors, sharp resolution, and immersive experience it offers are a testament to OnePlus' commitment to delivering top-notch visual quality. With 5G connectivity, browsing the web, streaming content, and engaging in online activities are incredibly smooth and seamless.

Powerful Performance:
Under the hood, the OnePlus 11R truly shines. Its robust processor, ample RAM, and ample storage capacity ensure smooth multitasking, rapid app launches, and efficient performance even with demanding tasks. Navigating through apps, games, and multimedia content feels effortlessly fluid and responsive.

Impressive Camera System:
The OnePlus 11R's camera system is a standout feature. The high-resolution main sensor, along with the array of auxiliary lenses, allows for versatile and creative photography. From stunning landscapes to detailed close-ups, the camera consistently delivers impressive results, capturing moments with clarity and vividness.

User-Friendly OxygenOS:
The OxygenOS interface is a testament to OnePlus' commitment to a user-friendly experience. Its clean design, customizable options, and intuitive navigation make using the OnePlus 11R a joy. Regular updates and optimizations ensure that the device remains current and efficient over time.

Amazon's Trusted Service:
Purchasing the OnePlus 11R from Amazon comes with the added assurance of reliable customer service and quality control. Amazon's reputation for authenticity and prompt assistance adds an extra layer of confidence to the purchase, making it a stress-free experience.

Incredible Value:
Considering the OnePlus 11R's impressive features, performance, and build quality, the value it offers is truly exceptional. It competes favorably with devices from higher price ranges, making it an outstanding investment for those seeking flagship-level performance without breaking the bank.

In conclusion, my experience purchasing the OnePlus 11R 5G 256GB from Amazon has been overwhelmingly positive. The device itself is a testament to OnePlus' commitment to innovation and quality, while Amazon's reliable service ensures a smooth and satisfying transaction. For anyone in search of a powerful, stylish, and feature-rich smartphone, the OnePlus 11R is a compelling choice that promises to elevate your digital experience to new heights.

From its sleek design to its unparalleled performance, this device is a true testament to OnePlus's commitment to crafting exceptional mobile experiences.

The Solar Red variant, in particular, exudes an aura of sophistication and style. Its textured leather back not only looks stunning but also feels incredibly luxurious in the hand. The vibrant red hue further accentuates the phone's elegance, making it a true head-turner.

The OnePlus 11R 5G Solar Red's camera capabilities are equally impressive. Furthermore, the phone's 100W SUPERVOOC charging technology is a game-changer. With just a quick 10-minute charge, you can top up your battery to a significant level, ensuring that you're always ready to go. This feature is a lifesaver for busy individuals who are constantly on the move.

In conclusion, the OnePlus 11R 5G Solar Red is a remarkable smartphone that excels in every aspect. name: OnePlus Nord 2T 5G (Jade Fog, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage)
reviews:
[{'name': 'Villdre', 'title': 'Pretty good phone, bad camera', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 16 April 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': 'This is a review after using the phone for about 10 days. My initial reaction was that the UI sucks - and it does suck compared to the Samsung UI. But OnePlus gives far less bloat ware than Samsung does. (I was upgrading from a Samsung M21). Samsung UI is more slick though.

Battery life is very good. It lasts the whole day with heavy hotspot tethering usage. With light usage and no tethering, it easily lasts 2 days. The VOOC charger is great and charges the phone in less than 30 minutes. But even though it‚Äôs an 80w charger, it does not charge my MacBook Pro.

This phone is pretty close to stock android, and is overall quite good. It has many of the smart features that come with stock android. Like live transcription, automatically copying OTPs from messages, etc.

The fingerprint scanner and face unlock are both good.

The phone does heat up a bit with heavy hotspot usage - but it‚Äôs manageable.

The hotspot wifi tethering feature was crucial for me. It works well with this phone. It has a strong 5G radio and a strong wifi radio. No complaints there.

The camera sucks. Really. Feels like the camera from 10k rupee phone. But I don‚Äôt really care, as this is my secondary phone.

Overall, it‚Äôs a good phone for the price range.
Read more'}, {'name': 'ASR', 'title': 'Really a Good Buy in this price range in 2022', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 7 September 2022', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': 'Verdict : A Solid buy for this price segment.

Disclaimer:
I'm not a OnePlus fanboy. This is my first OnePlus branded smartphone.
This review is based on my personal experience with the device purchased here in Amazon)
5G is not stable in my region. Hence, 5G related parameters are not included.

There are 4 review sections here at various stages of the usage/updates.

Review 4 - A week after an incremental update (Feb 2023 security patch | Received on 23 Feb 2023).
Review 3 - 30 days after the Oxygen OS 13 (Android 13) Stable Update (Received on 10 Jan 2023).
Review 2 - 15 days after the Oxygen OS 13 (Android 13) Open Beta Update (Received on 1 Dec 2022).
Review 1 - 30 days after the purchase of the device (Oxygen OS 12.1 | Android 12).

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Review 4:

> Ambient Light sensor issue resolved. Both front and rear Ambient light sensors are better responding.
> 3rd party icon support has been included.
> Spotify support in AOD has been implemented.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Review 3:

> Literally no change (neither improvement nor deterioration) from the Beta version.
(Wished at least for the Ambient light sensor (front) calibration optimization, but no improvement)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Review 2:
(An incremental update to enable Jio 5G received prior to this update).

Note: After the beta update, no new issues popped up.
i.e., there were;
No Heating related issues.
No fast battery drain.
No change in the Charging time.
No annoying bugs.
No change in camera performance.

Beta update is mostly like a Stable update.

OOS 13 (Android 13) update review:

Delighters:
> No new apps added. Absolutely NOT.
> System storage consumption remains the same (13.2 GB).
> Animations are more fluidic.
> More customization UI features added. (Scout widgets in home screen, Enlarged folder & lot more.)
> Daily data usage is available in the notification panel and need not be reset daily unlike earlier.
> Slight improvement in the Front Ambient light sensor.
> Ability to play videos in the background & screen OFF as well (even for YouTube)
(Really a welcoming & longing feature, which other brand UIs have not or only with screen OFF)
> Stand-by battery life has improved substantially.

Disappointers:
> Brightness at lowest level is brighter than before.
> No improvement in Sound levels. Still initial 40% is too silent.
> No Dolby Atomos (which was mentioned for OOS 13). Perhaps, to wait for Stable update.
> Auto brightness latency is higher than earlier. Response time is tad increased.
> Haptics have become tighter than earlier, but still not stronger.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Review 1:

Note:
- This review is after a month's usage.
- Received 2 updates during the course of time (Recent update was of 0.98 GB).
- System consumes 13.2 GB space. 128 GB variant is pretty adequate for a normal usage.
- N77 band is missing for 5G.
- The unit I bought DOES NOT have any sort of heating issues or fast battery drain issue.
- Shifting from a 120 Hz to this 90 Hz mobile. No noticeable difference observed. ( In Non-gaming aspect)
- Nothing Great or Nothing worse in the unmentioned parameters.

Things that are delighting;
> Exceptional signal reception (especially 4G+ carrier aggregation). Very fast download speeds.
> Insane Fast charging (0 to 100% in 40 mins, 30 to 100 % in 20 mins, excluding trickle charge). No heating of the mobile (just slight warming) during charging.
> Stand by charge and SoT is fantastic (Even more than 7.5 hrs, for Videos, YT and general tasks and calls, even in mobile data always ON and AOD set to Battery saver.
> Oxygen OS = Color OS/Realme OS - Bloatware. The skin is really good & nothing to complain like other brands' UI.
> Absolutely no 3rd party bloatware and no ads in the UI or any 2nd party apps. Even some 2nd party apps are "un-installable". No major bothering bugs noticed till date.
> Yes, the ICONIC "Alert slider" is present.

Things that are annoying;
> Dual ambient light sensor (1 in rear and other in front) is not well calibrated. The brightness is always in the lower side and frequent manual increase in required.
> Volume level is useless until 40% level (can be audible only in "Pin-drop silence ambience). Audible enough only post 40% level. Stereo speakers output are 70% bottom and 30 % earpiece. But full volume doesn't distort & is loud enough.
> Haptics are tight but not strong, even in higher levels. Effective only post 40% and best only @ 90% level)
> Hotspot drains battery quickly (even a warning notification pops up). Also, Chrome and Google app eats away battery quickly. Parallel downloads makes the area near the camera module warm).
> Though the in-hand feel is good, the buttons are of no close tolerances and wobbles a bit.
> Data billing cycle to be reset daily to show the daily data usage in the notification panel.
> The inbuild DAC (no 3.5 mm hole and only Type-C port) is not great. The Dirac equalizer is also not yielding best output. Perhaps, Dolby Atmos support in OOS 13 could improve the audio output.

============================================================================
Read more'}, {'name': 'ashish jangid', 'title': 'Best budget phone', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 22 December 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "I haven't bought a phone in the last 4 years as I could not find any phone that I liked. But my trusty old Honor phone has been showing its age for a while, and I had to get a new phone.

My aim was to get a decent mid-range phone with solid build quality, performance and a decent camera. I ruled out Samsung as I had several bad experiences with them and also ruled out the whole Oppo/Vivo line due to their flashy looks and the bloatware ridden OS.

I primarily use my phone for browsing, phone calls, music, very light gaming and occasional photography. I own a gaming computer and a decent DSLR camera, so gaming and camera performance were not a top priority for me.

The Nord 2T checked most of my requirements. It has a decent camera setup (don't expect iPhone or Xperia 1 level performance), pretty good performance, good screen and a strong battery. The price also seemed fair to me.

What I liked:

1. Good screen
2. Decent camera
3. Really fast charging and great battery backup
4. No bloatware in the OS. It is very clean.
5. Not too flashy
6. Good call quality
7. No camera notch or punch-hole in the middle. The camera punch hole is in a corner
8. Physical silent mode toggle

What I disliked:

1.The volume rocker is on the left side which is annoying as I inadvertently press it while trying to press the Lock/Unlock button
2. The auto-brightness algorithm is buggy and it tends to go too dark sometimes. Looks like a software issue.
3. No option to remove the Google Feed screen - I hate it. But it could be removed by disabling the Google app.
4. Volume level is a bit too low. But I always use the headphones, so not an issue for me.
5. Very slippery. I have the 'Sandstone' version and the phone keeps sliding though your fingers. Absolutely no grip what-so-ever. So the first thing I did was to get a back-cover with rubbery finish.
Read more"}]

reviews:
[{'name': 'Nishant', 'title': 'Best earbuds within budget', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 17 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Black SlateSize: Extra Large', 'review_body': "These are affordable, stylish, exceptional in performance and has great sound quality. Also it has an added advantage for users without one plus phones as it's parable to all Android devices, even my Samsung A50. Been using it for almost half a year now with no complaints so far however my one observation would be the microphone inbuilt to these earphones do not work as I can't keep my phone away from me and talk freely without the other person on the call not being able to hear me properly but it's not a hassle for me as I use these for music mainly or for work purposes when I'm at the office. These are far more better and reliable from a trusted brand like one plus and far superior in performance compared to other cheap one's within the same price range"}, {'name': 'Harish', 'title': 'Great budget TWS earphones but at a cost.', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 29 January 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Black SlateSize: Extra Large', 'review_body': 'I purchased these earphones soon after my Sony WI-C200s broke down and the buttons stopped functioning altogether. I refrained from buying BoAt earphones as I found them to simply be cheap Chinese copies of existing earphones that were dirt cheap and not really known for their quality. These seemed to be the best earphones under 2.5k atleast on paper, with great battery life and an array of features.

But I knew I would be sacrificing few features but at the time of purchase I did not know what they would be.

Upon receiving them, the first thing that caught my attention is the build quality. These are fabulously built for the price and you cannot go wrong with these with respect to the build quality. The case is solid and the earphones, although made of glossy plastic, feel premium enough and are not too heavy when in your ear. These earphones have a comfy fit and can fit most ear sizes with the three different silicone ear tips provided. Pairing was a breeze on my iPhone, but note that the HeyMelody app does not detect these on iOS, and I had to resort to using my friends‚Äô OnePlus phone in order to adjust the EQ, which was a HUGE bummer imo.

But the sheer quality of the sound made up for the connectivity issues. These blew my previous Sony neckband earphones out of the water! The noise isolation is satisfactory and the bass is thinly without getting too muddy. Mids and highs are beautifully balanced. But it‚Äôs not all sunshine and roses with these earbuds. They have severe connectivity issues which occur rarely but they are easily remedied by simply reconnecting the earbuds. Nonetheless, annoying to say the least. Battery life has been above average, lasting me about 6 hours on a single charge, while the case has already topped the earphones twice and hasn‚Äôt died out on me yet. The fit is pretty tight while using the small ear tips, and they haven‚Äôt fallen out of my ears even while jogging.

I would recommend these earphones to students on a budget and for casual listeners, while people seeking a stable connection while listening and prefer sound quality must look elsewhere, as well as iPhone owners.

full_title: Oneplus Nord Buds True Wireless in Ear Earbuds with Mic, 12.4mm Titanium Drivers, Playback:Up to 30hr case, 4-Mic Design + AI Noise Cancellation, IP55 Rating, Fast Charging (Black Slate)
about_this_item:
The OnePlus Nord Buds will be music to your ears with big 12.4 mm dynamic drivers for deeper bass & crisp clear sound.
For the OnePlus Nord Buds, you get to choose how heavy or light you want your sound with the help of sound master equalizer‚Äôs 3 unique audio profiles - Bold, Bass & Serenade.
The flagship-level battery life for the all-new OnePlus Nord Buds delivers up to 30 hrs of non-stop music on a single charge.
AI Noise Cancellation audio algorithm delivers precisely calibrated voice isolation during calls in the all-new OnePlus Nord Buds.
Enjoy Ultra-Fast Charing in the latest OnePlus Nord Buds. From 10mins of charging you get power of 5 hours.
OnePlus Fast Pair is only supported on OnePlus 6 series devices and up; running on Android 11 and up. To ensure the normal use of your earbuds, update your Wireless Earphones (OOS 12 or later), OnePlus Buds (OOS 11 or earlier), or HeyMelody (non-OnePlus devices) app to the latest version using your local app store.
Turning on automatic updates is recommended to ensure you can use the latest software and functions.
IP55 Dust & Water Resistance

But my trusty old Honor phone has been showing its age for a while, and I had to get a new phone.

My aim was to get a decent mid-range phone with solid build quality, performance and a decent camera. I ruled out Samsung as I had several bad experiences with them and also ruled out the whole Oppo/Vivo line due to their flashy looks and the bloatware ridden OS.

I primarily use my phone for browsing, phone calls, music, very light gaming and occasional photography. I own a gaming computer and a decent DSLR camera, so gaming and camera performance were not a top priority for me.

The Nord 2T checked most of my requirements. It has a decent camera setup (don't expect iPhone or Xperia 1 level performance), pretty good performance, good screen and a strong battery. The price also seemed fair to me.

What I liked:

1. Good screen
2. Decent camera
3. Really fast charging and great battery backup
4. No bloatware in the OS. It is very clean.
5. Not too flashy
6. Good call quality
7. No camera notch or punch-hole in the middle. The camera punch hole is in a corner
8. Physical silent mode toggle

What I disliked:

1.The volume rocker is on the left side which is annoying as I inadvertently press it while trying to press the Lock/Unlock button
2. The auto-brightness algorithm is buggy and it tends to go too dark sometimes. Looks like a software issue.
3. No option to remove the Google Feed screen - I hate it. But it could be removed by disabling the Google app.
4. Volume level is a bit too low. But I always use the headphones, so not an issue for me.
5. Very slippery. I have the 'Sandstone' version and the phone keeps sliding though your fingers. Absolutely no grip what-so-ever. So the first thing I did was to get a back-cover with rubbery finish.

name: iQOO Z6 Lite 5G by vivo (Stellar Green, 6GB RAM, 128GB Storage) | World's First Snapdragon 4 Gen 1 | 120Hz Refresh Rate | ...
reviews:
[{'name': 'Ahtesham', 'title': 'Impressive Performance and Value for Money', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 10 July 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Stellar GreenSize: 6GB RAM, 128GB StorageStyle Name: iQOO Z6 Lite 5G (With Charger)', 'review_body': "I recently purchased the iQOO Z6 Lite 5G in Stellar Green color, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. The phone came with a travel adapter included in the box, which is a nice bonus. Let me share my experience with this device.

Performance:
The iQOO Z6 Lite 5G boasts the world's first Snapdragon 4 Gen 1 chipset, and it truly lives up to the hype. The 6GB RAM paired with the powerful processor ensures smooth multitasking and lag-free performance even with heavy applications and games. I haven't faced any stuttering or slowdowns, and the 5G capability provides super-fast internet connectivity.

Display:
The 120Hz refresh rate on this phone is a game-changer. Scrolling through apps and websites is incredibly smooth and fluid. The colors are vibrant, and the display quality is top-notch. Whether you're watching videos or playing games, the visual experience is simply outstanding.

Storage:
With 128GB of internal storage, there's plenty of space for all my apps, photos, and videos. Plus, if you need more storage, you can always expand it using a microSD card, which is a convenient feature.

Battery Life:
The battery life is impressive as well. Even with heavy usage, the phone manages to last through the day comfortably. The inclusion of a charger in the box is a thoughtful touch, and it supports fast charging, which ensures you can quickly top up your battery when needed.

Camera:
The camera performance is good for the price range. The 48MP main sensor captures detailed and sharp images, especially in well-lit conditions. The 5MP macro and 2MP depth sensors are decent additions, but they don't deliver exceptional results in challenging lighting situations.

Build Quality:
The phone feels sturdy and well-built in hand. The Stellar Green color variant looks stunning with its unique gradient design. The device is also relatively lightweight, making it comfortable to carry around.

Value for Money:
Considering the features and performance, I believe the iQOO Z6 Lite 5G offers incredible value for money. It competes with devices that are priced higher but delivers a comparable experience at a more affordable price point.

Overall, I highly recommend the iQOO Z6 Lite 5G to anyone in the market for a powerful and feature-packed smartphone without breaking the bank. It's a well-rounded device that won't disappoint you, especially if you appreciate a smooth display, fast performance, and 5G connectivity.

Here's a comprehensive review of my experience with this device:

Pros:

Great Performance: The iQOO Z6 Lite 5G delivers on its promise of excellent performance, making multitasking, gaming, and app usage a smooth and seamless experience.

Good Battery Life: With respectable battery endurance, the device keeps up with daily demands, ensuring you stay connected and entertained throughout the day.

120Hz Display: The inclusion of a 120Hz display adds fluidity to interactions and enhances the visual experience, especially during gaming and scrolling.

Reliable Camera Performance: The camera system of the iQOO Z6 Lite 5G proves dependable, capturing moments with clarity and accuracy.

Premium Design: The device's design exudes a sense of premium craftsmanship, making it a stylish addition to your tech ensemble.

Cons:

Missing Charger in the Box: The absence of a charger in the package might be disappointing to users who expect a complete out-of-the-box experience.

Minor Lag and Software Experience: While the device's performance is commendable, some users might notice minor lags across the UI, indicating room for software optimization to enhance the overall user experience.

Lack of Night Mode in 4GB RAM Variant: Users of the 4GB RAM variant are left without the convenience of a night mode, potentially affecting low-light photography.

Limited 5G Bands: The device supports only two 5G bands, which could limit its compatibility and usability in certain regions.

Final Thoughts:

The iQOO Z6 Lite 5G stands out for its notable strengths in performance, battery life, display quality, camera capabilities, and premium design. However, it's not without its shortcomings. The absence of a charger and the software experience's minor lags might be areas of concern for some users. Additionally, the lack of a night mode in the 4GB RAM variant and the limited 5G band support could impact certain user preferences and usage scenarios.

In essence, the iQOO Z6 Lite 5G offers a commendable performance package, but its drawbacks should be considered in the context of your specific needs and priorities.

name: MI Power Bank 3i 20000mAh Lithium Polymer 18W Fast Power Delivery Charging | Input- Type C | Micro USB| Triple Output | Sa...
reviews:
[{'name': 'Anish Anurag', 'title': 'Your Reliable Power Source on the Go', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 24 July 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 20000mah', 'review_body': "The MI Power Bank 3i with a massive capacity of 20000mAh has proven to be a game-changer in my daily life. This portable powerhouse has become my go-to solution for keeping all my devices charged and ready to go, earning it a well-deserved five-star review.

Pros:
1. Huge Capacity
With its impressive 20000mAh capacity, this power bank offers abundant energy to charge my devices multiple times. Whether it's my smartphone, tablet, or even my wireless earbuds, the MI Power Bank 3i has more than enough juice to keep them running throughout the day.

2. Fast Charging Technology
The built-in fast charging technology is a standout feature of this power bank. It efficiently charges my devices in no time, saving me valuable minutes and ensuring I stay connected and productive even during busy days.

3. Dual USB Ports
I love the convenience of having dual USB ports. It allows me to charge two devices simultaneously without any compromise in charging speed. It's perfect for keeping both my phone and tablet powered up during travel or while working on the go.

4. Sturdy Build Quality
The MI Power Bank 3i boasts a sturdy and durable build quality. Its sleek metal casing not only looks elegant but also offers excellent protection against accidental drops or bumps, giving me peace of mind when carrying it in my bag.

5. LED Battery Indicator
The LED battery indicator is a practical addition that lets me check the power bank's remaining charge at a glance. This feature comes in handy, ensuring that I never run out of power unexpectedly.

Cons:
1. Slightly Heavy
Given its high capacity, the power bank is slightly heavier than smaller models. However, the extra weight is a minor trade-off for the extensive charging capabilities it provides.

Conclusion:
In conclusion, the MI Power Bank 3i 20000mAh is an outstanding power source that I can always rely on. Its huge capacity, fast charging technology, and dual USB ports make it an essential companion for my busy and tech-dependent lifestyle.

The sturdy build quality and LED battery indicator are thoughtful touches that add to its overall convenience and user experience. While it may be slightly heavier, the reliable and efficient performance of this power bank more than compensates for it.

For its exceptional capabilities and reliable performance, I wholeheartedly give the MI Power Bank 3i 20000mAh a glowing five-star rating. Embrace the convenience and power it offers, and never worry about running out of battery again. This power bank is undoubtedly a worthy investment for anyone seeking a reliable and high-capacity charging solution on the go.
Read more"}, {'name': 'Amazon Customer', 'title': 'Detailed Review - Must Read', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 2 October 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 20000mah', 'review_body': "When I bought this Powerbank, I didn't found a detailed review regarding this but now as I have used and tested this Powerbank (20000 mAh variant) for 7 days, so I think I'm eligible to write a detailed review for this. Mainly I will write this review based on 4 points, build quality, charging time of powerbank, charging speed and battery backup. So let's start.

1. Build Quality : The build quality of this Powerbank feels quite solid & nice. Its sandstone design texture and round edges makes its grip solid in hands & quite comfortable to hold. Before this I used to have Redmi Powerbank (20000 mAh) which in comparison to this Mi Powerbank feels little ugly in terms of design and uncomfortable to hold. Mi Powerbank feels less wider, thinner & more premium as compared to the previous one.

2. Charging Time of Powerbank : The day I received this Powerbank, its LED indicators showed 2 LEDs blinking which means it had battery level between 25% to 50%. So before using it for the first time, I charged it fully using my standard 10W charger.
One should also note that charging time of Powerbank along with the adapter also depends on what type of cable you are using. Using an old type C cable will take more time to charge it, as current carrying capacity of the cable decreases with time due to frequent usage. Although my 10W adapter is quite old but I have a new type C cable which supports fast charging, so I charged my powerbank with this setup and it took around 8 hours to charge it fully. So you can expect to charge it from 0 to 100% in around 11-12 hours using a 10W charger. Whereas if you use a fast charger like 33 Watt, 65 Watt etc. then ofcourse the powerbank will charge at a faster rate but it will also affect the efficiency and thermals of the powerbank in a negative way in the long run, so keep that in mind.

3. Charging Speed Test : I tested the charging speed provided by this powerbank using 3 different type C cables to charge my 4000 mAh mobile device. Each time I charged my device to 80% using different cables (in second case I forgot to check & it got charged up to 90%) and noted the overall time it took to charge the device. All the results are attached in order as screenshots for reference.
In first case, I charged it with my 2 yr old type C cable which although supports fast charging but the results were not impressive. (Time 1h 43 min Pic)
In second case, I charged it with a new type C cable which came with my tws earbuds but it does not supports fast charging and the results were relatively better as compared to the first case. (Time 1h 58min Pic)
In third case, I charged it with the type C cable which comes inside the box of this powerbank and supports fast charging, and in this case I got the most impressive results. The device got charged to 50% in just 30 min, and 80% in 1h 8min. (Time 1h 8min Pic)
So, it shows that the cable also plays a very important role in fast charging your device which many people ignore.

4. Battery Backup : Other than the above mentioned test results I charged my mobile 3 more times but didn't noted the charging time. So all in all, till now I have charged my device to a total of 406% in 6 different rounds (80% + 94% + 80% + 44% + 82% + 31%) and still 3 LED lights of powerbank are blinking which literally amazed me considering the negative reviews I read about its battery backup before buying it.

So, overall I would say you can buy this powerbank if it suits your requirements and budget. Also if you buy this powerbank then I would suggest you to charge it fully before using it for the first time and test other things during that 7 days replacement period, so if you find any issues with it, you would be able to replace it. I used AccuBattery app to record the battery percentage & time it took to charge my phone.

P.S : Will update the review in future if felt the need to do it.

reviews: [{'name': 'Gulshan kumar', 'title': "Yes it's amazing", 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 28 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GB', 'review_body': 'Very lovely product and valuable product and quality I love itü•∞üòÑüôèüëç'}, {'name': 'Dakshin', 'title': 'Very good product', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 18 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GB', 'review_body': 'I liked it very much given the price and the product functionality.'}, {'name': 'Aniruddha Neogi', 'title': 'Small and useful', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 6 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 32GB', 'review_body': 'Its so cute and small and does the intended work'}, {'name': 'ANANTHA BABU RAM', 'title': 'Good product', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 2 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 32GB', 'review_body': 'Easy to carry and good look but required for fast delivery'}, {'name': 'Bhumika s.', 'title': 'NOT ACCURATE MEMORY', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 14 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 128GB', 'review_body': 'NOT ACCURATE MEMORY'}, {'name': 'Joyel Jomon', 'title': 'Good', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 19 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GB', 'review_body': 'Nice product'}, {'name': 'Gratitude', 'title': 'the fine packaging by SanDisk merely required a bubbles pack which ...', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 13 April 2016', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 16GB', 'review_body': 'received the two 16gb and 8gb pen drives within two days where a sunday fell in the middle ,well in time as always! the fine packaging by SanDisk merely required a bubbles pack which Amazon provided. the product is super. why i didn\'t have two 16gb drives ? Amazon didn\'t allowed ! so here we go from box to operation (for old buddies) ; 1.receive delivery, open package ,find the product ,check its code and accept the product (and make the payment) 2.cut it with the scissor marks only (and don\'t spoil the packing, it can be used for a long time) and with the help of the two finger ,with a little care and trick, take it out. 3.Pc\'s anti virus ready for a removable drive scan, pc connected to internet for latest driver installation and automatic installation is active in device installation settings. 4 then insert it into the usb 2.0 port gently with the name SanDisk on the top. 5 within seconds \'\'the driver is installed and device is ready to use" message appears. 6 now, antivirus scans it and hopefully its clear. 7.now check it for the errors. right click upon the sandisk/pen drive icon and go to properties at bottom and click it. my 16 gb pendrive shows capacity as 14.5gb (EFFECTIVE)! 8.move to the next section \'TOOLS\' at the top and go for the "Check now\' (radio) button and hopefully, everything is good. 9.now the pendrive can be used for storage purposes. make at least a single folder in the pendrive,preferably. now drag any item from any location window and drop to the new folder window in the pendrive or just copy and paste. 10 additionally, in the Property box, there is also a tab \'ReadyBoost" (wow ! my pc has checked the device and found that it can be used for ready boost! when its only USB 2.0 ! ) readyboost can really boost your system with HDD and low RAM. the box further asks you to dedicate the pendrive for readyboost or allot at least 4gb = 4096mb for the readyboost to work effectively or not to use it for readyboost at all ! if you don\'t want to use it for readyboost, just don\'t do there anything in the readyboost tab. Mind that the space you allocate for readyboost can\'t be used for storage purposes. you can use 32 gb for readyboost @ maximum on each pen drive and you can add 8 such pendrives @ max to a single Pc. 11.apart from storage and readyboost, these usb drives can also be made bootable. i mean you can also use them to install windows,etc or start a pc with them.etc, etc. Believe me installing windows,etc with pendrives is a lot faster than with a installation dvd and where pen drive\'s life is 5 year and we all know about a dvd\'s life. all the more external/ internal dvd writers life is hardly two years now a days. an external dvd writer in the price band of 1500/- to 2000/- is mostly assured of 1 year life (only TRANSCEND assures 2 year life in that price band). what we have to do is just find a suitable installer for an app .there are tools to make multiboot pendrives. RAYMOND CC is a very good search site for advance uses which is secured by NORTON and provides a lot of safe download sites which you can instantly check with VIRUS TOTAL! 12. back to our task , check the drive for ten days return period and then register it with SanDisk and get a 5 year warranty/ guarantee.13 CAUTION: dont just pullout the pendrive to detach it from Pc ! data loss may happen. always remove removable storage safely. there will be a a green lock in the \'Task Bar\' @ bottom and near the right corner of the desktop.and when you hover mouse pointer/cursor over it, it would say \'safely remove hardware\'. click it and a small box would say \'safely remove USB Mass storage device\' with the listing of removable drives. There you have to select the drive and click it. then a window will appear saying \'this device can now be safely removed from the computer\' then you have to pull it out gently. otherwise there will be a message window saying that \'the device cannot be detached\' or \'some program is still using the device\' or something like that. in that case make it sure that no program is using that for eg copying , scanning, etc. finish the process(s) , save your work, come out and again start from the green lock. if you are not able to make out where it is being used or opened, don\'t panic but also don\'t pull it out. keep on doing what you are doing save all your work and do a complete shut down and then you can detach it with no fear. additionally, as i know if you are using it for readyboost, it would not be detachable in the middle and not even try to do that ! 14. i forgot to mention that there is also a special option in the product. you can encrypt your data on it. it means you can block access to that data by other users. therefore SanDisk has put one application Executable and one guide PDF (for the use of that application) on the pen drive. that PDF is for windows users. and mac users can download guide straight from the second PDF. i think its more useful for storage purposes. THANKS.\nRead more'}, {'name': 'Harihariharan V.M', 'title': 'Wonderful', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 14 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 128GB', 'review_body': 'Good quality'}]

name: SanDisk Ultra¬Æ microSDXC‚Ñ¢ UHS-I Card, 64GB, 140MB/s R, 10 Y Warranty, for Smartphones
reviews:
[{'name': 'Aditya Sharma', 'title': 'SanDisk Extreme microSD UHS-I Card 64GB: Unleash the Power of 4K Video Recording', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 9 June 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GBStyle Name: Upto 190Mbps- For 4K Video', 'review_body': "I recently purchased the SanDisk Extreme microSD UHS-I Card 64GB, and it has exceeded my expectations when it comes to capturing and storing high-quality 4K videos on my smartphone and action camera. With its impressive read and write speeds, this memory card has proven to be a reliable companion for my multimedia needs.

The standout feature of the SanDisk Extreme microSD card is its exceptional performance. With a read speed of up to 170MB/s and a write speed of up to 80MB/s, this card handles the demands of recording and transferring 4K videos with ease. It ensures smooth and uninterrupted video capture, allowing me to capture every detail and moment without any lag or buffering. The fast write speed also enables quick data transfer from the card to my computer, saving valuable time and ensuring a seamless workflow.

The 64GB storage capacity is ample for storing a significant amount of 4K footage. It provides plenty of space for recording videos, capturing high-resolution photos, and storing other multimedia content. The card's compatibility with various devices, including smartphones and action cameras, makes it a versatile choice for a wide range of users. Whether I'm shooting adventure footage or capturing precious moments, this card delivers consistent and reliable performance.

Durability is another area where the SanDisk Extreme microSD card excels. It is designed to withstand extreme conditions, including temperature variations, water, shock, and X-ray exposure. This ruggedness gives me peace of mind, knowing that my valuable footage is protected even in challenging environments. Whether I'm hiking, skiing, or engaging in any outdoor activities, I trust that this card can handle the elements without compromising my data.

The card also comes with SanDisk's RescuePRO Deluxe software, which is a valuable addition. This software allows for easy recovery of accidentally deleted files, offering an additional layer of protection and peace of mind. It has proven to be a lifesaver on a few occasions when I unintentionally deleted important files.

In terms of usability, the SanDisk Extreme microSD card is incredibly user-friendly. The card's standard microSD form factor ensures compatibility with a wide range of devices, and the included adapter allows for easy transfer to larger SD slots. The card is also backward compatible with lower-speed UHS-I devices, ensuring optimal performance across various devices.

Overall, I highly recommend the SanDisk Extreme microSD UHS-I Card 64GB for anyone seeking a reliable, high-performance memory card for capturing and storing 4K videos. Its impressive read and write speeds, ample storage capacity, durability, and compatibility make it an excellent choice for smartphones, action cameras, and other devices. With this memory card, you can unleash the full potential of your 4K video recording capabilities and capture memories in stunning detail.

full_title: boAt Airdopes 141 Pro True Wireless in Ear Earbuds with 45H Playtime, Quad Mics Enx Tech, 12mm Drivers, ASAP Charge, Beast Mode for Gaming & BT v5.3(Siberian White)
about_this_item:
Playback- These true wireless earbuds offer a total playtime of up to 45HRS, including up to 9HRS of playtime per earbud..Note : If the size of the earbud tips does not match the size of your ear canals or the headset is not worn properly in your ears, you may not obtain the correct sound qualities or call performance. Change the earbud tips to ones that fit more snugly in your ears
Clear Voice Calls- Be heard clearly across voice calls without those background interruptions, with the ENx Tech enabled quad mics that cancel out unwanted ambient noise during calls, on Airdopes 141 Pro.
Drivers- Delve into the boAt Signature Sound on Airdopes 141 Pro TWS earbuds courtesy its 12mm audio drivers.
ASAP Charge- Courtesy our ASAP Charge technology, the earbuds can fetch up to 60 minutes of playback time in just 5 minutes of charging time.
Low Latency- Enjoy a lag less gaming and entertainment experience with BEAST Mode for low latency so that your sessions always stay smooth.
Bluetooth- The Bluetooth v5.3 wireless technology in the earbuds supports a seamless listening experience every time.
Instant Connect- The IWP tech makes it easier to power on the earbuds which occurs as soon as you open the case lid when the earbuds are being kept inside.

Brand boAt
Model Name Airdopes 141 Pro
Colour Siberian White
Form Factor In Ear
Connectivity Technology Bluetooth
overall_review: Customers are satisfied with the appearance of the headphones. However, they have reported issues with fit. They mention that the ear piece is broad and not suitable for small or medium ear canals. Customers also have issues with charging. Opinions are mixed on sound quality, quality, battery life, comfort, and value.

6) Should have been added few more security options.

name: OnePlus 11R 5G (Galactic Silver, 8GB RAM, 128GB Storage)
reviews:
[{'name': 'Vishal Shivapujimath', 'title': 'Go for it', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 9 August 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 16GB RAM, 256GB StorageColour: Sonic Black', 'review_body': "I recently embarked on a journey to upgrade my smartphone, and the OnePlus 11R 5G 256GB model purchased from Amazon has proven to be an exceptional choice. This device combines cutting-edge technology, remarkable performance, and the convenience of Amazon's reliable service, resulting in a seamless and satisfying purchasing experience.

Effortless Ordering and Expedited Delivery:
Purchasing the OnePlus 11R 5G 256GB from Amazon was a breeze. The user-friendly interface allowed me to navigate through the available options and place my order with ease. I opted for expedited delivery, and true to Amazon's reputation, the package arrived promptly and in pristine condition, well before the expected delivery date.

Impressive Design and Build Quality:
Upon unboxing the OnePlus 11R, I was immediately captivated by its sleek and elegant design. The device's premium construction exudes a sense of sophistication and modernity. Its slim profile and well-crafted chassis make it comfortable to hold, while the attention to detail in its build quality instills confidence in its durability.

Vivid Display and 5G Connectivity:
The OnePlus 11R's display is nothing short of stunning. The vibrant colors, sharp resolution, and immersive experience it offers are a testament to OnePlus' commitment to delivering top-notch visual quality. With 5G connectivity, browsing the web, streaming content, and engaging in online activities are incredibly smooth and seamless.

Powerful Performance:
Under the hood, the OnePlus 11R truly shines. Its robust processor, ample RAM, and ample storage capacity ensure smooth multitasking, rapid app launches, and efficient performance even with demanding tasks. Navigating through apps, games, and multimedia content feels effortlessly fluid and responsive.

Impressive Camera System:
The OnePlus 11R's camera system is a standout feature. The high-resolution main sensor, along with the array of auxiliary lenses, allows for versatile and creative photography. From stunning landscapes to detailed close-ups, the camera consistently delivers impressive results, capturing moments with clarity and vividness.

User-Friendly OxygenOS:
The OxygenOS interface is a testament to OnePlus' commitment to a user-friendly experience. Its clean design, customizable options, and intuitive navigation make using the OnePlus 11R a joy. Regular updates and optimizations ensure that the device remains current and efficient over time.

Amazon's Trusted Service:
Purchasing the OnePlus 11R from Amazon comes with the added assurance of reliable customer service and quality control. Amazon's reputation for authenticity and prompt assistance adds an extra layer of confidence to the purchase, making it a stress-free experience.

Incredible Value:
Considering the OnePlus 11R's impressive features, performance, and build quality, the value it offers is truly exceptional. It competes favorably with devices from higher price ranges, making it an outstanding investment for those seeking flagship-level performance without breaking the bank.

In conclusion, my experience purchasing the OnePlus 11R 5G 256GB from Amazon has been overwhelmingly positive. The device itself is a testament to OnePlus' commitment to innovation and quality, while Amazon's reliable service ensures a smooth and satisfying transaction. For anyone in search of a powerful, stylish, and feature-rich smartphone, the OnePlus 11R is a compelling choice that promises to elevate your digital experience to new heights.
Read more"}, {'name': 'kunal', 'title': 'Awesome phone for the Camera & Gaming freaks 100W Charge is really working well', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 30 November 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "In the realm of smartphones, the OnePlus 11R 5G Solar Red stands as a beacon of innovation and excellence. From its sleek design to its unparalleled performance, this device is a true testament to OnePlus's commitment to crafting exceptional mobile experiences.

The Solar Red variant, in particular, exudes an aura of sophistication and style. Its textured leather back not only looks stunning but also feels incredibly luxurious in the hand. The vibrant red hue further accentuates the phone's elegance, making it a true head-turner.

Beyond its captivating aesthetics, the OnePlus 11R 5G Solar Red delivers a performance that is nothing short of phenomenal. Powered by the ultra-fast Snapdragon¬Æ 8+ Gen 1 Mobile Platform and boasting up to 18GB of LPDDR5X RAM, this smartphone handles even the most demanding tasks with ease. Multitasking is a breeze, and even the most graphically intensive games run smoothly without a hitch.

The phone's 120Hz Super Fluid AMOLED display is another highlight. With its vibrant colors, remarkable clarity, and ultra-smooth refresh rate, it provides an immersive and visually stunning experience. Whether you're streaming videos, gaming, or simply browsing the web, the display ensures that every visual element is rendered with exceptional detail and precision.

The OnePlus 11R 5G Solar Red's camera capabilities are equally impressive. The triple-camera system, featuring a 50MP Sony IMX890 main sensor, captures stunning photos and videos in any lighting condition. Whether you're capturing the beauty of a sunrise or the excitement of a night out, the camera system ensures that your memories are preserved with exceptional clarity and detail.

Furthermore, the phone's 100W SUPERVOOC charging technology is a game-changer. With just a quick 10-minute charge, you can top up your battery to a significant level, ensuring that you're always ready to go. This feature is a lifesaver for busy individuals who are constantly on the move.

In conclusion, the OnePlus 11R 5G Solar Red is a remarkable smartphone that excels in every aspect. Its captivating design, unmatched performance, impressive camera capabilities, and fast charging technology make it a truly exceptional device. If you're seeking a smartphone that seamlessly blends style, innovation, and performance, the OnePlus 11R 5G Solar Red is the perfect choice for you.

name: Fire-Boltt Phoenix Smart Watch with Bluetooth Calling 1.3",120+ Sports Modes, 240 * 240 PX High Res with SpO2, Heart Rate ...
reviews:
[{'name': 'Soumya Ranjan Tripathy', 'title': 'Design', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 13 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Style Name: Phoenix Pro 1.39"Colour: Gold Black', 'review_body': "Unleash the Power on Your Wrist

When it comes to combining cutting-edge technology with sleek design, the Firebolt Watch stands out as a formidable contender. As an avid tech enthusiast and watch aficionado, I've had the pleasure of putting this timepiece through its paces, and here's my comprehensive review.

Design:
The Firebolt Watch boasts a captivating design that seamlessly blends futuristic aesthetics with timeless elegance. Crafted from premium materials, its stainless steel case exudes durability while maintaining a lightweight feel on the wrist. The sleek matte finish and minimalist dial design exude sophistication, making it suitable for both casual and formal occasions. The attention to detail in the construction is evident, from the precision-engineered crown to the finely crafted strap options that ensure a comfortable fit for every wearer.

Functionality:
What truly sets the Firebolt Watch apart is its impressive array of features and functionalities. At its core, it is a smartwatch that seamlessly integrates with your digital life. The vibrant OLED display delivers crisp visuals, whether you're checking notifications, tracking your fitness goals, or simply glancing at the time. With its intuitive touchscreen interface and responsive controls, navigating through the watch's myriad functions is a breeze.

One of the standout features of the Firebolt Watch is its comprehensive health and fitness tracking capabilities. Equipped with advanced sensors, including a heart rate monitor and GPS, it provides real-time insights into your activity levels, sleep patterns, and overall wellness. Whether you're hitting the gym or exploring the great outdoors, this watch serves as your dedicated health companion, empowering you to reach your fitness goals with ease.

Performance:
Under the hood, the Firebolt Watch is powered by a robust processor that ensures smooth performance and snappy responsiveness. Whether you're multitasking between apps, streaming music, or engaging in a workout session, the watch delivers seamless performance without any lag or slowdowns. With its long-lasting battery life, you can confidently wear it throughout the day and beyond, knowing that it will keep up with your active lifestyle.

Connectivity:
In today's interconnected world, seamless connectivity is paramount, and the Firebolt Watch delivers on this front. Compatible with both iOS and Android devices, it effortlessly syncs with your smartphone, allowing you to stay connected on the go. Whether you're receiving calls, texts, or app notifications, you'll never miss a beat with this watch by your side. Plus, with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, you can easily stream music, control smart home devices, and access a wealth of third-party apps right from your wrist.

Conclusion:
In conclusion, the Firebolt Watch is a true powerhouse that combines style, functionality, and performance in a single package. Whether you're a tech-savvy individual looking for a versatile smartwatch or a fashion-forward trendsetter seeking a statement accessory, this watch ticks all the boxes. With its sleek design, advanced features, and seamless connectivity, it's not just a timepiece‚Äîit's a companion that empowers you to conquer your day with confidence. So why settle for ordinary when you can ignite your wrist with the Firebolt Watch?
Read more"}, {'name': 'nilesh s.', 'title': 'Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194: Budget-Friendly Fitness on Your Wrist', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 16 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Style Name: Phoenix AMOLEDColour: AMOLED Gold', 'review_body': "Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194: Budget-Friendly Fitness on Your Wrist
The Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194 is a smartwatch aimed at those looking for a feature-packed wearable at an affordable price. Let's see if it lives up to the hype.
Design and Build:
* The Phoenix boasts a 1.43-inch AMOLED display with a decent resolution, offering clear visuals.
* The metal body feels surprisingly sturdy for the price, and the IP67 water resistance allows you to take it for runs or wear it in the rain.
* While some reviewers find the design sporty and functional, others might consider it a bit bulky.
Features:
* The standout feature is Bluetooth calling, which lets you make and receive calls directly from your wrist. This is a convenience you won't find in many smartwatches at this price point.
* Beyond calls, it offers a suite of health and fitness trackers, including heart rate monitoring, SpO2 (blood oxygen) measurement, and multiple sports modes.
* Sleep monitoring and stress monitoring are included as well, although their accuracy might be debated.
Battery Life:
* The Fire-Boltt Phoenix is advertised to last up to 5 days on a single charge, which is fairly standard. However, frequent use of features like Bluetooth calling can significantly reduce that.
Other Considerations:
* The companion app might not be the most intuitive, and some users report occasional syncing issues.
* While the watch offers a wide variety of watch faces, their quality can be inconsistent.
Overall:
The Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194 is a solid option for budget-minded fitness enthusiasts who prioritize features like Bluetooth calling. The display is good, the build quality is decent, and the health tracking features, while not perfect, are a welcome addition. However, keep in mind the potential drawbacks like a less-than-perfect app and average battery life when making your decision.
Here's a quick breakdown:
Pros:
* Affordable price
* Bluetooth calling
* Multiple health and fitness tracking features
* AMOLED display
Cons:
* Bulky design (subjective)
* App could be improved
* Inconsistent battery life with heavy use
If you're looking for a feature-rich smartwatch at a great price, the Fire-Boltt Phoenix BSW 194 is a strong contender. Just be sure to manage your expectations for app performance and battery life.
Read more"}, {'name': 'Lawrence', 'title': 'Bright display with big round dial', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 15 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Style Name: Phoenix 1.3"Colour: Pink', 'review_body': 'Good impressive watch. The big dial and the display is what impressed me the most. It was a gift that I had given to a close person. They liked it as well. One suggestion was to help with the app to be downloaded for pairing with the watch. Overall i would recommend this watch to anyone who is looking style, elegance and an affordable price point.'}]
