I would say it's one of the best Bluetooth mouse available which is quite pocket friendly
Got a decent dpi and is overall pretty smooth while using it"}, {'name': 'Nishant Kumar', 'title': 'Best wireless mouse in this price range.', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 15 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Pattern Name: Mouse', 'review_body': "Overall performance is average, battery life is damn good. No any issues as I'm using it for past 6 months. Size is really compact and can totally be covered by hand."}, {'name': 'Anand', 'title': 'Small, not too heavy, good looking.', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 11 July 2022', 'product_category_purchased': 'Pattern Name: Mouse', 'review_body': "Hi guys! Bought this yesterday, so haven‚Äôt used it much, so an early review. But the most detailed review so please read till the end. Very important points are mentioned.

Looks are cute! It looks really nice and elegant. I am using it with a MacBook Air. So far it seems there are no problems using it. The scrolling is smooth, connection does not drop, and there is no lag. Connection is instant. There is no pairing required. It's plug and play along with the dongle provided with it.

It sits low on the table, feels weighty but not in a wrong way. The battery adds to it's weight, but I have used heavier mice before, and this one feels just right. It has good grip. Nothing to complain about that.

Buttons are nice and clicks are satisfactory, not too noisy; they are just right. Scroll wheel doesn't feel cheap at all, though I believe it could've been better quality. Body is matt finish and doesn't leave fingerprints on it, though if you're someone who eats and handles the mouse, then it'll show the oil prints and that's true with any peripherals. The mouse doesn't feel cheap overall, but it is definitely plasticky, though not in the bad sense. It is definitely not cheap looks wise.

There is an on, off switch on the bottom which is helpful in saving the battery (which is included) when the mouse is not in use. There is no light on the bottom which is good if you have kids in the house who keep flipping the mouse and staring at the super bright light. So that's a good thing and a definite plus! The overall shape and size works in the favour of the mouse, and a variety of users with small and large palms will be satisfied with it.

Now over to a major flaw. The mouse connects only though it's own usb dongle (which by the way comes tucked inside the body of the mouse itself, inside the battery door, which I found mighty impressive) and not through the laptop's bluetooth. Now this means two things- 1. You have to carry around the usb dongle with you everywhere you go, which means if you happen to forget it at home while traveling and carry just the mouse, then the mouse is pretty much useless in that scenario. And worse still, if you happen to carry it out of station with you and bring back only the mouse and forget to pack the dongle, then you're stuck and I don't think you get only the dongle (you'll have to check that with the seller), and then the mouse is left useless in that case. 2. Now over to the problem I am facing, which I did not see anyone else mention in their reviews. I use a MacBook, so it doesn't have USB-C inputs, which means you must buy a connector for it to connect the dongle. I actually had already bought a connector so that was not a problem for me, but you will have to factor in the cost of the connector, which is not cheap, because you want to buy only good quality connector for your expensive MacBook. Of course that is a problem with the MacBook and not with the mouse, but consider this point. It is very important. It will NOT connect over MacBook's Bluetooth. Otherwise, it works well with the MacBook. The only caveat I found is the tracking speed on level 2 is too slow and on level 3 is too fast. You'll have to get used to that thing. It doesn't feel very natural (as the trackpad on the MacBook feels) because of that speed problem, but otherwise, the pointer flows smoothly on screen and doesn't jump around, at least with my mouse. Also, the battery door does make a noise when landing the mouse on the pad, and I feel it could have been made better. But I guess at the cost, you really can't complain too much.

Overall, I think a good buy, but the compulsion of having to use it with it's own dongle is a major drawback I feel. If that doesn't bother you, then nothing else should keep you from buying this product, especially since it is one of the cheapest wireless mice out there at less than 600 bucks, which is what it cost me.
Read more"}, {'name': 'Benny', 'title': 'Center click stopped working after 5-6 months', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 30 January 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Pattern Name: Mouse', 'review_body': 'Mouse is good, easy to hold, and ergonomic BUT the center-click (scroll button) stopped working after a few months, which is a bummer because I use it often to open links on new tabs in the browser.
So if you are a middle-click user like me, look for alternate options!'}, {'name': 'Achintya', 'title': 'Use and Throw mouse', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 8 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Pattern Name: Mouse', 'review_body': 'This mouse is good in terms of use, small, nice design, good battery life and also BT range is good. The only problem I find is either with the scroll or the sensor. This mouse will work good till 1 year to 1 year 6 months. The scroll wheel will get damage. So after that throw the mouse. So if you are planning for like 3 years, this is not the right fit for you.'}, {'name': 'Nihar Vishwakarma', 'title': 'Works nicely', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 5 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Pattern Name: Mouse', 'review_body': 'Nice connectivity and speed.'}]

name: Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - Alexa smart speaker for music, smart home, kids learning & added Bluetooth control
reviews:
[{'name': 'Rochak jha', 'title': 'Fantastic Addition to My Home - Amazon Alexa 3rd Gen Review', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 18 May 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "I recently purchased the Amazon Alexa 3rd Gen smart speaker from Amazon, and I must say it has quickly become an essential part of my daily routine. This device is simply outstanding, and I can't imagine my life without it now.

First and foremost, the audio quality is impressive. The speaker produces rich, clear sound that fills the room with music. Whether I'm listening to my favorite playlists or asking Alexa to play the news or podcasts, the audio experience is always top-notch. The bass is deep, and the trebles are crisp, resulting in a well-balanced sound profile.

The voice recognition capabilities of Alexa are exceptional. She accurately picks up my voice commands even when I'm across the room or playing music at higher volumes. It's a joy to interact with Alexa, who responds promptly and provides useful information or performs tasks effortlessly. From setting reminders and alarms to checking the weather or controlling my smart home devices, Alexa is like a personal assistant always at my beck and call.

I also appreciate the sleek and modern design of the Amazon Alexa 3rd Gen. Its compact size allows it to fit seamlessly into any room without taking up too much space. The fabric finish adds a touch of elegance, making it aesthetically pleasing and blending well with my home decor.

The setup process was a breeze. It took me just a few minutes to connect the speaker to my Wi-Fi network and link it to my Amazon account. The intuitive Alexa app guided me through the process step by step, ensuring a seamless setup experience.

One feature I particularly enjoy is the integration with other smart devices. I can effortlessly control my compatible lights, thermostats, and even my TV using voice commands through Alexa. It has truly made my home smarter and more convenient.

In terms of privacy, Amazon has made great strides in addressing concerns. The ability to mute the microphone easily provides peace of mind when I don't want Alexa listening in. I appreciate the transparency and control Amazon offers in this regard.

Overall, the Amazon Alexa 3rd Gen smart speaker is a phenomenal addition to any home. Its exceptional audio quality, impressive voice recognition, seamless setup process, and integration with smart devices make it a must-have device. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their daily routines and enjoy the benefits of a truly smart home assistant.

Read more'}, {'name': 'prashant chauhan', 'title': 'Value for Money', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 30 September 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "I recently purchased the Echo Dot (Black) Combo with Wipro 9W Smart Color Bulb, and I'm thrilled with this smart home bundle. It combines the convenience of voice control with the versatility of smart lighting. Here's my review:

Echo Dot (3rd Generation):

Compact and Stylish: The Echo Dot is compact and fits seamlessly into any room. Its sleek design complements any decor, and the black finish adds a touch of elegance.

Voice Assistant: Alexa, the voice assistant, is incredibly responsive and versatile. It answers questions, provides weather updates, sets alarms, and controls smart devices, making it a valuable addition to any smart home.

Music and Entertainment: I love using the Echo Dot to stream music from various services. The sound quality is surprisingly good for its size, and it fills a room with clear audio. It also connects to other Echo devices for a multi-room music experience.

Smart Home Control: With the Echo Dot, I can control my smart home devices effortlessly. Whether it's adjusting the thermostat, turning on lights, or locking doors, Alexa handles it all with voice commands.

Wipro 9W Smart Color Bulb:

Vibrant Colors: The Wipro smart bulb delivers vibrant and customizable colors. I can change the lighting to match my mood or create a specific ambiance for different occasions.

Dimmable: The bulb is dimmable, allowing me to set the brightness to my liking. It's perfect for creating a relaxing atmosphere or brightening up a room.

Voice Control: Integration with Alexa makes controlling the smart bulb a breeze. I can change colors, adjust brightness, or turn it on/off with simple voice commands.

Scheduling and Automation: The Wipro app enables scheduling and automation. I can set timers to turn the light on and off at specific times or create routines for different scenarios.

Energy-Efficient: The LED bulb is energy-efficient, helping reduce electricity consumption and lower energy bills.

Setup and Compatibility:

Setting up both the Echo Dot and the Wipro smart bulb was straightforward. They are compatible with a wide range of smart home devices, making them a central hub for home automation.

Value for Money:

This combo pack offers excellent value for money. You get a versatile smart speaker and a high-quality smart bulb at an affordable price.

In conclusion, the Echo Dot (Black) Combo with Wipro 9W Smart Color Bulb is an excellent addition to any smart home. It provides convenience, entertainment, and enhanced lighting options. Whether you're new to smart home technology or looking to expand your existing setup, this bundle is a fantastic choice. It has made my daily routines more efficient and my living space more comfortable and enjoyable.

full_title: Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - Smart speaker with Alexa (Black)
about_this_item:
3rd Generation Echo Dot-Smart Speaker with Alexa that can be operated by voice. Alexa can speak English and Hindi.
Just ask Alexa to play music from Amazon Music, Hungama, Spotify, Jio Saavn, Apple Music. (some apps may require subscription).
Voice control Alexa compatible smart appliances like lights, ACs, TVs, geysers. Extend the experience to non-smart appliances using smart plugs (to be purchased separately)
Manage your day better by just asking Alexa to set reminders, pay bills, read news and much more.
Use as a standalone speaker or pair your phone to use it as a Bluetooth speaker
Echo Dot comes with multiple privacy controls, including a mic off button.
overall_review: Customers like the quality and sound quality of the digital device. They say it's a great piece of technology, with good loud sound. Customers also like the ease of use. However, some customers are disappointed with performance. Opinions are mixed on connectivity, voice recognition, Alexa integration, and value.

full_title: Fire-Boltt Invincible Plus 1.43" AMOLED Display Smartwatch with Bluetooth Calling, TWS Connection, 300+ Sports Modes, 110 in-Built Watch Faces, 4GB Storage & AI Voice Assistant (Black)
about_this_item:
AMOLED 2.5D Display - FIre-Boltt Invincible Plus comes with a 1.43" AMOLED Display with 460*460pixel High Resolution. This watch supports a 2.5D full lamination curve display to enhance the usage experience. The watch has 700 NITS Peak Brightness
The watch will work on a single charge for about 5 days (without Bluetooth calling & Always On Display) and about 2 Days with Bluetooth calling.
Charging Specs - The watch needs to be charged for 3 hours to reach 100%. The charger should be a 3.7V to 5V adapter or any laptop output. For a bare minimum of 20% charge the watch needs to be charged for about 30-40 mins
TWS Connection - The watch supports your earbuds to be connected with the watch while you sit back and enjoy the songs being played with a 4GB internal storage
300 Sports Modes - Fire-Boltt Invincible Plus ensures a fit and healthy living. The watch consists of 300 sports modes to track your activities with minute details. Tracking steps, calories, km and taking one step ahead now you can track your dance class and much more
Supported Applications - Notifcations from all social media channels (Instagram, Whatsapp, Facebook), Call Notifications, Health Tracking (SpO2, Heart Rate, Sleep), Sports Tracking & many more
110 Inbuilt Watch Faces - The watch can store upto 110 watch faces for you to style each day and never get enough of it
product_desc:
Brand Fire-Boltt
Model Name Invincible Plus
Style Plus AMOLED
Colour Black
Screen Size 1.43 Inches
overall_review: Customers like the display, features, value, and battery life of the wearable computer. For example, they mention it's smooth, has excellent quality, and has a lot of useful features like BT calling, music, games, and sensors. That said, opinions are mixed on performance and connectivity.

name: GM 3060 E-Book 4 + 1 Power Strip 240 Volts with Master Switch, Indicator, Safety Shutter & 4 International sockets, Red & ...
reviews:
[{'name': 'Deepak', 'title': 'Does the job, great on its price!', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 18 August 2020', 'product_category_purchased': 'Style Name: Pack of 1', 'review_body': "Please refer to attached photos for quick review and its a great extension if i sum it up here...

:::FOR DETAILED REVIEW üëáüëá:::::

First of all i was very curious about the quality it will offer on such a low price but it exceeded my expectations!

PROS:
1. Quality of cable, main plug & socket are good for the price.
2. Protectors on the socket are providedüëç
3. Overall quality of its outer body plastic and the cable are very good.
4. Four Socket support is great ( considering many 3 plug extension of same price available on Amazon)
5. Color combination is pretty decent and looks good.
6. The overall power output is 2500W with 10 amp max total of all outputs (good for almost every customer, i use 4.7 amp lapy charger 2 amp phone charger 1.5 amp alexa adapter and 0.5 amp wifi adapter all simultaneously which sums out as 8.7 amp which is obviously <10amp, one can also use a 10amp device on a single socket only leaving all sockets empty).
7. The socket distance are good enough to use standard devices simultaneously like laptop chargers and phone's power brick and many other 2 plug pins socket of home theatres or any other appliances...
but if your plug is different from standard design (like OnePlus power brick) then it can be pretty messy.
As i use my WiFi router adapter,laptop charger and phone's charger and alexa adapter simultaneously and it fits in pretty perfectly leaving very less space between the consecutive plug which feels sometimes pretty annoying for ex. like i have already inserted 2 plugs in the socket and one socket is empty between those two then in inserting a plug between them it feels little annoying and is not so easy process....
but yeah it all can be used simultaneously in all standard cases.
8. Surge protection is given (don't know if it will work properly or not but it's nice to have it though it terms of satisfaction).
9. A reddish orange sort of colour indicator is given to show it is whether on or off, which is great and is missing mostly in many other extensions of this price.

CONS:
1. The spacing between consecutive sockets should have been provided like atleast 6 to 8 mm of extra to have hassle free plug-unplug experience.
But still it's okay...
2. If an usb port for charging could have been provided in the so much unnecessary leftover space in the front portion, then this will surely be a perfect extension.
3. If separate switch is provided then it will surely be helpful (like i always have my laptop charger plugged in the extension and when of no use still its unnecessarily ON so i have to remove it)
But still NOT a big deal breaker.

AS YOU CAN SEE THERE ARE LESS CONS AS COMPARED TO PROS AND NONE OF THE CONS ARE SO MUCH OF A DEAL BREAKER
SO IN MY FRANK OPINION IT SEEMS A VERY NICE DEAL INSTANTLY CONSIDERING IT'S PRICE & FIRST IMPRESSIONS...

BUT IT WILL BE A GOOD DEAL ONLY IF IT WILL WORK LONGER AS PER EVERY INDIANS REQUIREMENT IS THIS.

SO I WILL TRY TO POST UPDATES ALSO AFTER USING IT FOR 3 MONTHS.

BUT IT REALLY IS A GOOD PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE.

THANKYOU FOR READING!

about_this_item:
Verstile International sockets (with child safety shutter) The safety shutter keeps children safe & also prevents dust from getting into unsend sockets overtime.
2 Meter Heavy duty cord A special nylon velcro cable tie has been provided on the long power cord for convenience during operation and storage.
Supply Indicator The Spike guard has an LED Supply indicator embedded in the ergonomic design that indicates power status if On/Off.
Novel & Distinctive design Combination of advanced mould design, unique exquisite workmanship & our commitment to perfection have rendered the product its excellent quality.
Safety shutdown technology It has Thermal overload trip to power off your system, which saves all connected devices in the event of a severe over current or when the surge protection is disable. You can press red button to return to safe function mode. Ergonomic design- Adequate space has been provided between the sockets for accommodating plugs of different designs. Suitable for household, office, computer and its Peripherals, DVD, T.V etc

name: boAt BassHeads 900 On-Ear Wired Headphones with Mic (White)
reviews:
[{'name': 'Manish Kumar', 'title': 'In This Price Very Good Headphone', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 6 October 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Pearl WhiteStyle Name: Bassheads 900Pattern Name: Headphones', 'review_body': 'Build quality

The BassHeads 900 are well-built headphones. The ear cups and headband are made of plastic, but they feel sturdy and durable. The ear cups are also padded with soft memory foam, which makes them comfortable to wear for long periods of time.

Sound quality

The BassHeads 900 produce a good overall sound quality. The mids and highs are clear and detailed, and the bass is present but not overpowering. However, the bass is not as deep or punchy as some other headphones in this price range.

Mic and noise cancellation

The mic on the BassHeads 900 is poor. It is difficult to understand your voice on calls, and it picks up a lot of background noise. The noise cancellation on the BassHeads 900 is also poor. It does not block out much background noise, so you will still be able to hear traffic, people talking, and other noises when listening to music or podcasts.

Overall

The boAt BassHeads 900 are a good pair of budget-friendly wired on-ear headphones. They offer good sound quality, average bass, and a good battery life. However, the mic and noise cancellation are poor.

Pros:

Good build quality
Good sound quality
Average bass
Good value for money
Cons:

Poor mic
Poor noise cancellation
Recommendation

If you are looking for a pair of budget-friendly wired on-ear headphones with good sound quality, the boAt BassHeads 900 are a good option. However, if you need good mic or noise cancellation, you should look for a different pair of headphones.

Please note that the BassHeads 900 are not computer headphones specifically. They are just regular wired on-ear headphones that can be used with any device with a 3.5mm audio jack.

Rating: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ

I recently had the opportunity to try out a pair of earbuds that have genuinely enhanced my listening experience. These earbuds have impressed me with their sound quality, comfort, and overall performance. Allow me to share my detailed review.

First and foremost, the sound quality delivered by these earbuds is exceptional. The audio is clear, balanced, and immersive, allowing me to truly appreciate the nuances in my favorite music. The bass is rich and punchy, while the midrange and treble frequencies are well-defined and crisp. Whether I'm listening to classical melodies or energetic rock tunes, these earbuds consistently deliver an enjoyable audio experience.

Comfort is another aspect where these earbuds shine. They come with a variety of ear tip sizes, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit for different ear shapes. The lightweight design and ergonomic shape make them easy to wear for extended periods without causing discomfort or fatigue. I appreciate that they stay securely in place, even during workouts or active movements.

The battery life of these earbuds is commendable as well. They provide a substantial playtime on a single charge, allowing for uninterrupted listening throughout the day. The charging case is compact and portable, making it convenient to carry and ensuring that the earbuds are always ready to use.

One feature I particularly appreciate is the seamless Bluetooth connectivity. Pairing the earbuds with my devices was effortless, and the connection remained stable without any dropouts. The wireless range is impressive, allowing me to move around without being tethered to my device. Additionally, the earbuds feature intuitive touch controls, allowing easy access to play/pause, volume adjustment, and call management.

While the overall performance of these earbuds is exceptional, I did encounter a minor drawback. The noise isolation could be improved, especially in louder environments. Although they provide some passive noise reduction, ambient sounds can still be heard, which may affect the immersion in certain situations.

In conclusion, these earbuds have impressed me with their superior sound quality, comfort, and convenient features. They offer an immersive listening experience, and their long battery life ensures uninterrupted enjoyment. Despite a minor limitation in noise isolation, these earbuds are a reliable choice for music enthusiasts and individuals seeking a wireless audio solution. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a high-quality pair of earbuds.

reviews: [{'name': 'Gulshan kumar', 'title': "Yes it's amazing", 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 28 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GB', 'review_body': 'Very lovely product and valuable product and quality I love itü•∞üòÑüôèüëç'}, {'name': 'Dakshin', 'title': 'Very good product', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 18 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GB', 'review_body': 'I liked it very much given the price and the product functionality.'}, {'name': 'Aniruddha Neogi', 'title': 'Small and useful', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 6 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 32GB', 'review_body': 'Its so cute and small and does the intended work'}, {'name': 'ANANTHA BABU RAM', 'title': 'Good product', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 2 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 32GB', 'review_body': 'Easy to carry and good look but required for fast delivery'}, {'name': 'Bhumika s.', 'title': 'NOT ACCURATE MEMORY', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 14 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 128GB', 'review_body': 'NOT ACCURATE MEMORY'}, {'name': 'Joyel Jomon', 'title': 'Good', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 19 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GB', 'review_body': 'Nice product'}, {'name': 'Gratitude', 'title': 'the fine packaging by SanDisk merely required a bubbles pack which ...', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 13 April 2016', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 16GB', 'review_body': 'received the two 16gb and 8gb pen drives within two days where a sunday fell in the middle ,well in time as always! the fine packaging by SanDisk merely required a bubbles pack which Amazon provided. the product is super. why i didn\'t have two 16gb drives ? Amazon didn\'t allowed ! so here we go from box to operation (for old buddies) ; 1.receive delivery, open package ,find the product ,check its code and accept the product (and make the payment) 2.cut it with the scissor marks only (and don\'t spoil the packing, it can be used for a long time) and with the help of the two finger ,with a little care and trick, take it out. 3.Pc\'s anti virus ready for a removable drive scan, pc connected to internet for latest driver installation and automatic installation is active in device installation settings. 4 then insert it into the usb 2.0 port gently with the name SanDisk on the top. 5 within seconds \'\'the driver is installed and device is ready to use" message appears. 6 now, antivirus scans it and hopefully its clear. 7.now check it for the errors. right click upon the sandisk/pen drive icon and go to properties at bottom and click it. my 16 gb pendrive shows capacity as 14.5gb (EFFECTIVE)! 8.move to the next section \'TOOLS\' at the top and go for the "Check now\' (radio) button and hopefully, everything is good. 9.now the pendrive can be used for storage purposes. make at least a single folder in the pendrive,preferably. now drag any item from any location window and drop to the new folder window in the pendrive or just copy and paste. 10 additionally, in the Property box, there is also a tab \'ReadyBoost" (wow ! my pc has checked the device and found that it can be used for ready boost! when its only USB 2.0 ! ) readyboost can really boost your system with HDD and low RAM. the box further asks you to dedicate the pendrive for readyboost or allot at least 4gb = 4096mb for the readyboost to work effectively or not to use it for readyboost at all ! if you don\'t want to use it for readyboost, just don\'t do there anything in the readyboost tab. Mind that the space you allocate for readyboost can\'t be used for storage purposes. you can use 32 gb for readyboost @ maximum on each pen drive and you can add 8 such pendrives @ max to a single Pc. 11.apart from storage and readyboost, these usb drives can also be made bootable. i mean you can also use them to install windows,etc or start a pc with them.etc, etc. Believe me installing windows,etc with pendrives is a lot faster than with a installation dvd and where pen drive\'s life is 5 year and we all know about a dvd\'s life. all the more external/ internal dvd writers life is hardly two years now a days. an external dvd writer in the price band of 1500/- to 2000/- is mostly assured of 1 year life (only TRANSCEND assures 2 year life in that price band). what we have to do is just find a suitable installer for an app .there are tools to make multiboot pendrives. RAYMOND CC is a very good search site for advance uses which is secured by NORTON and provides a lot of safe download sites which you can instantly check with VIRUS TOTAL! 12. back to our task , check the drive for ten days return period and then register it with SanDisk and get a 5 year warranty/ guarantee.13 CAUTION: dont just pullout the pendrive to detach it from Pc ! data loss may happen. always remove removable storage safely. there will be a a green lock in the \'Task Bar\' @ bottom and near the right corner of the desktop.and when you hover mouse pointer/cursor over it, it would say \'safely remove hardware\'. click it and a small box would say \'safely remove USB Mass storage device\' with the listing of removable drives. There you have to select the drive and click it. then a window will appear saying \'this device can now be safely removed from the computer\' then you have to pull it out gently. otherwise there will be a message window saying that \'the device cannot be detached\' or \'some program is still using the device\' or something like that. in that case make it sure that no program is using that for eg copying , scanning, etc. finish the process(s) , save your work, come out and again start from the green lock. if you are not able to make out where it is being used or opened, don\'t panic but also don\'t pull it out. keep on doing what you are doing save all your work and do a complete shut down and then you can detach it with no fear. additionally, as i know if you are using it for readyboost, it would not be detachable in the middle and not even try to do that ! 14. i forgot to mention that there is also a special option in the product. you can encrypt your data on it. it means you can block access to that data by other users. therefore SanDisk has put one application Executable and one guide PDF (for the use of that application) on the pen drive. that PDF is for windows users. and mac users can download guide straight from the second PDF. i think its more useful for storage purposes. THANKS.\nRead more'}, {'name': 'Harihariharan V.M', 'title': 'Wonderful', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 14 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 128GB', 'review_body': 'Good quality'}]

[{'name': 'AshokKumar', 'title': 'Impressive Performance and Exceptional Battery Life: Samsung Galaxy M33 5G Review', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 21 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "The Samsung Galaxy M33 5G is an absolute powerhouse, boasting a perfect blend of performance, style, and endurance. From its stunning design to its remarkable battery life, this device delivers on all fronts, making it a compelling choice for users seeking a reliable and feature-rich smartphone.

First and foremost, the design of the Galaxy M33 5G is sleek and modern. The Deep Ocean Blue color variant exudes sophistication, while the well-crafted construction feels premium in hand. The attention to detail is evident, with smooth curves and a seamless finish that make it a pleasure to hold and behold.

Performance-wise, the Galaxy M33 5G does not disappoint. With its 8GB of RAM and ample 128GB of internal storage, multitasking is a breeze, and there's plenty of space for storing all your apps, photos, and media files. The inclusion of 5G connectivity ensures lightning-fast speeds, enabling seamless streaming, gaming, and browsing experiences without any lag or hiccups.

One of the standout features of the Galaxy M33 5G is its massive 6000mAh battery, which sets a new standard for endurance. With such a robust battery capacity, you can go through an entire day of heavy usage with ease, without having to constantly worry about running out of power. Whether you're binge-watching your favorite shows, gaming for hours on end, or tackling productivity tasks, the Galaxy M33 5G has got you covered.

Moreover, the expandable storage option, supporting up to 16GB, provides added flexibility for users who require additional space for their growing media libraries or large files. This feature ensures that you never have to compromise on storing your precious memories or essential documents.

The Galaxy M33 5G also excels in the camera department, capturing stunning photos and videos with its versatile camera setup. Whether you're snapping scenic landscapes or taking selfies with friends, the results are consistently impressive, thanks to the device's advanced imaging capabilities.

In conclusion, the Samsung Galaxy M33 5G is a standout smartphone that ticks all the right boxes. From its premium design and powerful performance to its exceptional battery life and expandable storage options, it offers incredible value for money. If you're in the market for a reliable and feature-packed smartphone that won't break the bank, the Galaxy M33 5G is undoubtedly worth considering. Highly recommended.

name: SanDisk Ultra¬Æ microSDXC‚Ñ¢ UHS-I Card, 128GB, 140MB/s R, 10 Y Warranty, for Smartphones
reviews:
[{'name': 'Aditya Sharma', 'title': 'SanDisk Extreme microSD UHS-I Card 64GB: Unleash the Power of 4K Video Recording', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 9 June 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 64GBStyle Name: Upto 190Mbps- For 4K Video', 'review_body': "I recently purchased the SanDisk Extreme microSD UHS-I Card 64GB, and it has exceeded my expectations when it comes to capturing and storing high-quality 4K videos on my smartphone and action camera. With its impressive read and write speeds, this memory card has proven to be a reliable companion for my multimedia needs.

The standout feature of the SanDisk Extreme microSD card is its exceptional performance. With a read speed of up to 170MB/s and a write speed of up to 80MB/s, this card handles the demands of recording and transferring 4K videos with ease. It ensures smooth and uninterrupted video capture, allowing me to capture every detail and moment without any lag or buffering. The fast write speed also enables quick data transfer from the card to my computer, saving valuable time and ensuring a seamless workflow.

The 64GB storage capacity is ample for storing a significant amount of 4K footage. It provides plenty of space for recording videos, capturing high-resolution photos, and storing other multimedia content. The card's compatibility with various devices, including smartphones and action cameras, makes it a versatile choice for a wide range of users. Whether I'm shooting adventure footage or capturing precious moments, this card delivers consistent and reliable performance.

Durability is another area where the SanDisk Extreme microSD card excels. It is designed to withstand extreme conditions, including temperature variations, water, shock, and X-ray exposure. This ruggedness gives me peace of mind, knowing that my valuable footage is protected even in challenging environments. Whether I'm hiking, skiing, or engaging in any outdoor activities, I trust that this card can handle the elements without compromising my data.

The card also comes with SanDisk's RescuePRO Deluxe software, which is a valuable addition. This software allows for easy recovery of accidentally deleted files, offering an additional layer of protection and peace of mind. It has proven to be a lifesaver on a few occasions when I unintentionally deleted important files.

In terms of usability, the SanDisk Extreme microSD card is incredibly user-friendly. The card's standard microSD form factor ensures compatibility with a wide range of devices, and the included adapter allows for easy transfer to larger SD slots. The card is also backward compatible with lower-speed UHS-I devices, ensuring optimal performance across various devices.

Overall, I highly recommend the SanDisk Extreme microSD UHS-I Card 64GB for anyone seeking a reliable, high-performance memory card for capturing and storing 4K videos. These are far more better and reliable from a trusted brand like one plus and far superior in performance compared to other cheap one's within the same price range"}, {'name': 'Harish', 'title': 'Great budget TWS earphones but at a cost.', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 29 January 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Black SlateSize: Extra Large', 'review_body': 'I purchased these earphones soon after my Sony WI-C200s broke down and the buttons stopped functioning altogether. I refrained from buying BoAt earphones as I found them to simply be cheap Chinese copies of existing earphones that were dirt cheap and not really known for their quality. These seemed to be the best earphones under 2.5k atleast on paper, with great battery life and an array of features.

But I knew I would be sacrificing few features but at the time of purchase I did not know what they would be.

Upon receiving them, the first thing that caught my attention is the build quality. These are fabulously built for the price and you cannot go wrong with these with respect to the build quality. The case is solid and the earphones, although made of glossy plastic, feel premium enough and are not too heavy when in your ear. These earphones have a comfy fit and can fit most ear sizes with the three different silicone ear tips provided. Pairing was a breeze on my iPhone, but note that the HeyMelody app does not detect these on iOS, and I had to resort to using my friends‚Äô OnePlus phone in order to adjust the EQ, which was a HUGE bummer imo.

But the sheer quality of the sound made up for the connectivity issues. These blew my previous Sony neckband earphones out of the water! The noise isolation is satisfactory and the bass is thinly without getting too muddy. Mids and highs are beautifully balanced. But it‚Äôs not all sunshine and roses with these earbuds. They have severe connectivity issues which occur rarely but they are easily remedied by simply reconnecting the earbuds. Nonetheless, annoying to say the least. Battery life has been above average, lasting me about 6 hours on a single charge, while the case has already topped the earphones twice and hasn‚Äôt died out on me yet. The fit is pretty tight while using the small ear tips, and they haven‚Äôt fallen out of my ears even while jogging.

I would recommend these earphones to students on a budget and for casual listeners, while people seeking a stable connection while listening and prefer sound quality must look elsewhere, as well as iPhone owners.

full_title: Oneplus Nord Buds True Wireless in Ear Earbuds with Mic, 12.4mm Titanium Drivers, Playback:Up to 30hr case, 4-Mic Design + AI Noise Cancellation, IP55 Rating, Fast Charging (Blue Agate)
about_this_item:
The OnePlus Nord Buds will be music to your ears with big 12.4 mm dynamic drivers for deeper bass & crisp clear sound.
For the OnePlus Nord Buds, you get to choose how heavy or light you want your sound with the help of sound master equalizer‚Äôs 3 unique audio profiles - Bold, Bass & Serenade. The flagship-level battery life for the all-new OnePlus Nord Buds delivers up to 30 hrs of non-stop music on a single charge.
AI Noise Cancellation audio algorithm delivers precisely calibrated voice isolation during calls in the all-new OnePlus Nord Buds. Enjoy Ultra-Fast Charing in the latest OnePlus Nord Buds. From 10mins of charging you get power of 5 hours.
OnePlus Fast Pair is only supported on OnePlus 6 series devices and up; running on Android 11 and up. To ensure the normal use of your earbuds, update your Wireless Earphones (OOS 12 or later), OnePlus Buds (OOS 11 or earlier), or HeyMelody (non-OnePlus devices) app to the latest version using your local app store.
Turning on automatic updates is recommended to ensure you can use the latest software and functions.
IP55 Dust & Water Resistance

Brand OnePlus
Model Name TWS Nord
Colour Blue Agate
Form Factor In Ear
Connectivity Technology Wireless

name: MI Cordless Beard Trimmer 1C, with 20 length settings, 60 MInutes of usage, & USB Fast charging, black
reviews:
[{'name': 'shivansh Vishwakarma', 'title': 'Efficient and Versatile - I Cordless Beard Trimmer 1C is a Must-Have Grooming Tool!', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 1 August 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "The I Cordless Beard Trimmer 1C has been a game-changer in my grooming routine, offering a seamless and efficient trimming experience. With its 20 length settings, 60 minutes of usage time, and USB fast charging, this black trimmer has become an indispensable part of my daily grooming regimen.

The first thing that impressed me was the versatility of this trimmer. The 20 length settings allow for precise and customizable beard trimming, giving me the flexibility to achieve my desired beard length and style effortlessly. Whether I want a clean shave or a well-groomed beard, this trimmer delivers consistent results every time.

The cordless design is incredibly convenient, as it allows me to move freely during the trimming process without being restricted by a power cord. The 60 minutes of usage time on a single charge is more than sufficient for multiple grooming sessions, and I rarely have to worry about recharging it frequently.

The USB fast charging feature is a game-changer, especially for someone on the go. It eliminates the need for carrying multiple chargers, as I can easily connect the trimmer to my laptop, power bank, or any USB-enabled device for charging.

The sleek black color and ergonomic design add a touch of style to the trimmer. It feels comfortable and easy to hold during use, reducing any strain on my hand or wrist.

The trimmer's sharp and precise blades make trimming effortless, and I rarely experience any pulling or tugging of hair during the process. This ensures a smooth and comfortable trimming experience without any irritation.

Cleaning the trimmer is a breeze as well. The detachable head allows for easy cleaning under running water, and the provided cleaning brush helps remove any residual hair with ease.

One minor suggestion for improvement would be to include a travel pouch or storage case to keep the trimmer and its accessories organized and protected during travel.

In conclusion, the I Cordless Beard Trimmer 1C is an efficient and versatile grooming tool that I highly recommend to anyone looking for a reliable and high-performance beard trimmer. With its 20 length settings, 60 minutes of usage time, USB fast charging, and comfortable design, it meets all my grooming needs. The convenience of cordless use and easy cleaning further enhance its appeal. If you want a top-notch beard trimmer that delivers excellent results with every use, the I Cordless Beard Trimmer 1C is a must-have addition to your grooming arsenal!

Its vibrant display and responsive touch screen enhance user experience. With a robust health tracking system, it monitors heart rate, sleep, and activity, empowering users with real-time data. Seamless integration with both Android and iOS devices keeps users connected through prompt notifications. The built-in GPS adds precision to outdoor activities. Remarkably, the smartwatch combines these features with an impressive battery life, ensuring prolonged usage. Durable and stylish, the Firebolt Gladiator Smartwatch stands out as a reliable and feature-rich choice in the ever-evolving landscape of smart wearables.'}, {'name': 'Kunal N Gorakh', 'title': 'Fire-Boltt Gladiator: A Budget-Friendly Fitness Smartwatch Review', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 4 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: Aqua Loop BlackStyle Name: Aqua Loop', 'review_body': "An Affordable Fitness Companion

The Fire-Boltt Gladiator is a noteworthy contender in the realm of budget-friendly fitness smartwatches. With its sleek design, comprehensive health tracking features, and attractive price point, it aims to cater to fitness enthusiasts without straining their wallets.

Design and Build Quality:
The Fire-Boltt Gladiator sports a modern and sporty design, featuring a square-shaped dial with a vibrant touchscreen display. Its lightweight build and comfortable silicone strap make it suitable for all-day wear, whether you're at the gym or out for a run. Despite its budget-friendly price, the device feels premium, boasting solid construction and attention to detail.

Health and Fitness Tracking:
Equipped with sensors including a heart rate monitor, blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) monitor, and accelerometer, the Fire-Boltt Gladiator offers comprehensive health and fitness tracking capabilities. Users can monitor their heart rate, track workouts, measure blood oxygen levels, and analyze sleep patterns with ease. The device also supports multi-sport tracking, accurately recording various activities like running, cycling, and swimming.

Smart Features:
In addition to fitness tracking, the Fire-Boltt Gladiator serves as a capable smartwatch with various useful features. It provides notifications for calls, messages, and app alerts, ensuring users stay connected even during workouts. With support for music playback control and a remote camera shutter function, it offers added convenience on the go. However, it's important to note that the smart features are relatively basic compared to more premium smartwatches.

Battery Life:
One of the standout features of the Fire-Boltt Gladiator is its impressive battery life. With up to 7 days of usage on a single charge, users can rely on the device to keep up with their active lifestyle without constantly needing to recharge. This extended battery life sets it apart from many other smartwatches in its price range, making it an appealing option for those who prioritize endurance.

Overall Impressions:
The Amazon Fire-Boltt Gladiator is a commendable offering for budget-conscious individuals seeking a reliable fitness companion. With its sleek design, comprehensive health tracking features, long battery life, and affordable price tag, it offers excellent value for money. While it may lack some advanced smartwatch functionalities found in higher-end models, its focus on health and fitness makes it a compelling choice for anyone looking to kickstart their wellness journey without breaking the bank.

In conclusion, the Fire-Boltt Gladiator proves to be a worthy contender in the entry-level smartwatch market, combining affordability with functionality to deliver a compelling user experience.

Supported Applications - Notifcations from all social media channels (Instagram, Whatsapp, Facebook), Call Notifications, Health Tracking (SpO2, Heart Rate, Sleep), Sports Tracking & many more (This is not a medical device)
8 Unique UI Modes - Now Switch your UI viewing method basis your mood and preference. Choose from over 8 different & stylish forms in the watch

name: Redmi Note 11 (Space Black, 4GB RAM, 64GB Storage)|90Hz FHD+ AMOLED Display | Qualcomm¬Æ Snapdragon‚Ñ¢ 680-6nm | 33W Charger ...
reviews:
[{'name': 'Himanshu Jadhav', 'title': '"Redmi Note 11 - A Feature-Rich Smartphone that Exceeds Expectations!"', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 25 October 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "I recently acquired the Redmi Note 11 smartphone from Amazon, and it has been a remarkable addition to my tech collection. This phone combines an array of impressive features and a stylish design that exceeded my expectations.

The first thing that stood out was the phone's sleek and modern design. The slim profile and the choice of colors make it visually appealing and comfortable to hold. It's evident that Redmi has paid attention to the aesthetics.

The display is a treat for the eyes. The vibrant colors and sharp resolution offer a fantastic viewing experience, whether I'm browsing the web, watching videos, or playing games. The sizable screen provides ample real estate for multitasking.

Performance-wise, the Redmi Note 11 truly shines. The powerful processor ensures smooth and responsive usage, even with multiple apps running simultaneously. It handles demanding games and apps with ease, without any noticeable lag.

The camera setup is versatile and capable. The image quality is impressive, and the camera app provides various modes and features to enhance your photography. Whether it's capturing stunning landscapes or detailed close-ups, this smartphone delivers.

Battery life is another strong point. The Redmi Note 11 easily lasts through a full day of heavy use, and the fast-charging feature is a lifesaver when I need a quick power top-up.

I also appreciate the customization options within the MIUI interface. It allows me to tailor the user experience to my preferences.

In conclusion, the Redmi Note 11 is an outstanding smartphone that offers a fantastic balance of style, performance, and affordability. It has exceeded my expectations in every aspect, making it an exceptional value for its price. I would confidently rate it 5 stars. If you're in the market for a feature-rich smartphone that doesn't break the bank, the Redmi Note 11 is a fantastic choice!

The third impressive factor is it's dual speaker....I have an another phone of 40k and the sound quality is almost same as it. Media playback experience is also enhanced by it's amoled display, very colour charming display...... literally the display quality is unbeatable. The camera notch and dual speaker increase the media playing experience. Other Performance like gaming is also good at this price point. Fingerprint button is also very responsive. All other things and features are good to the price point.
Only one thing is very disappointing bcoz the hype of its camera that company shows is very up to the mark and professional photography but the camera is lower grade...even my old Redmi Y2 which I exchanged with this, had better camera than this ....So plz I request you to all .... don't buy this for camera....just don't. The images are shown of camera pictures on the website is illustration according to me......I don't recommend you to buy this phone as your camera phone.

Read more"}, {'name': 'Carlos Calaca', 'title': 'Great phone for daily use', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 3 January 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "I bought the Redmi Note 11 a few weeks ago and I am very happy with it. It has a 6.43-inch amoled display with a 90Hz refresh rate, which makes everything look smooth and vibrant. The screen is also protected by Corning Gorilla Glass 3, so I don't have to worry about scratches or cracks.

The phone runs on the Snapdragon 680 processor, which is fast and efficient. It can handle multitasking and gaming without any lag or overheating. The phone doesn't heat up even after prolonged use, and it works smoothly without any glitches or errors. I chose the 6GB RAM and 64GB storage variant, which gives me enough space for all my apps, photos, and videos. The phone also has a dedicated microSD slot, so I can expand the storage if I need to.

The camera is another highlight of the phone. It has a quad-camera setup on the back, with a 50MP main camera, an 8MP ultra-wide camera, a 2MP macro camera, and a 2MP depth camera. The photos are sharp, detailed, and colorful, even in low-light conditions. The phone also has a 13MP selfie camera, which takes decent selfies and supports face unlock.

The battery life is impressive as well. The phone has a 5000mAh battery, which can last for a whole day of moderate use. It also supports 33W fast charging, which can charge the phone from 0% to 100% in about an hour. The phone also has a USB Type-C port, a 3.5mm headphone jack, an infrared port, and a side-mounted fingerprint scanner.

The phone comes with MIUI 14, which is based on Android 13. It has a lot of features and customization options, such as dark mode, floating windows, app lock, game mode, and more. It also has some useful apps, such as Mi Remote, Mi Share. The phone is also upgradable to Android 13, which is a bonus.

Overall, I think the Redmi Note 11 is a great phone for its price. It has a beautiful display, a powerful processor, a good camera, a long-lasting battery, and a user-friendly software. It is great for daily use, whether it is for work, entertainment, or communication. It is definitely one of the best phones in the market right now, and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a budget-friendly smartphone.

Better than most IPhones. Great speed. Sound quality is excellent. Camera quality is also very good except for zoomed photos. Durability is excellent. Size is a but much, due to which it may slip. Comfortable to use but the matt finish is slippery. Better to buy such a phone than to waste money on an IPhone which is you basically paying taxes and duties for the Government.'}]

name: OnePlus 11 5G (Titan Black, 16GB RAM, 256GB Storage)
reviews:
[{'name': 'Niraj', 'title': 'Beast (best) phone at this price with well thought compromises', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 23 February 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 8GB RAM, 128GB StorageColour: Titan Black', 'review_body': "Been using OnePlus 11 for about a week now and at this price range there's no phone right now which can be considered as an overall package.

Pros -
Extraordinary battery life and even better 100W charging. You'll always appreciate how this makes your life easier when you know you can get your phone charged to 50% in 10 minutes.
I don't think I need to review the SoC which is 8gen2. It's not about how super powerful it is but how good it works in terms of efficiency and heating. Though it is start of summer only, I haven't felt gte phone heating up even once. It's like these two problems which ruined last two years Android scene are non existent this time.
Display is quite capable with Dolby vision and Dolby Atmos tech, the viewing experience is as immersive as it gets at this price or may be higher.
Haptics are awesome, you don't see (feel) haptics as good as this except iphones or pixels.
Color OS inspired Oxygen OS is quite good and if we ignore some bugs highlighted by MKBHD. I moved from OnePlus 6 which was maybe pinnacle of OnePlus and Oxygen OS to this and I feel like it's an upgrade.

4 years of OS updates and 5 years of security updates. Their updates are not as frequent and useful as Google but this adds to phone's overall life. You can at least get it repaired and have parts replaced in this window. I couldn't get power button replaced on my old OP6 because it was out of support.

Camera is decent. It is actually competing with Samsung and iPhones and beating them in low light shots. This is change as OnePlus cameras used to be B+ which is now A- with other flagships at A+ but they also don't come this cheap except pixel. One disappointment is front facing camera. DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE IF YOU'RE A SELFIE LOVER and don't like Vivo and Oppo approach of making your skin look smooth and brighter. Front video is also called at 1080p which is a shame. Should have been 4k30 at least.

Cons - as said earlier, there are some annoying bugs/features in UI which can be easily fixed through a small update.

Display is not brighter indoor as iphones and Samsung ultras but you won't feel if you haven't seen those.

One very apparent disadvantage vis a vis S23 is lack of Wireless charging and IP rating. These are compromises which I think ok to not have if we are getting quad HD display at this price. Although I would have preferred reverse wireless charging so I could charge my earbuds on the go.

And last, the most beautiful thing about his phone is it comes with charger and screen guard and a phone case in the box. Appreciate this when trillion dollar companies like Google and Apple don't provide this despite charging more than 1 lakh.

I hope you find this helpful. I was criticizing OnePlus and Qualcomm heavily for past two years on all platforms but this is the year they have turned it around.
Read more"}, {'name': 'Karthik Krishnamoorthy', 'title': 'Super battery', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 22 January 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': 'Amazing battery. Super fast charging. It easily lasts for minimum 30 to 36 hours. With light usage, it can lats even more.
Processor must be great that phone quick. There is no lag. I bought it immediately after its release, so still it is performing well. Has good options for customisation.
Camera is amazing with some pre defined filters. So pictures come out well. But at times, photos comes out saturated, I mean intensity of Color will be high.
Overall good buy.'}, {'name': 'Lolita', 'title': 'Beast', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 29 September 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 8GB RAM, 128GB StorageColour: Eternal Green', 'review_body': "As a OnePlus family member I just upgraded from my OnePlus 7 to OnePlus 11.

Pros:
1) Screen quality: Looks and colours are awesome.
2)Fast charging
3)Long lasting battery: After heavy usage I will get 6.5-7 hrs of screen on time.
4) camera: Th portrait shots looks awesome. Front camera is average.
5) OnePlus UI: Easy to handle, since got used to it from past 4years.
6) performance: As of now no lags observed during BGMI or day to day tasks.

Cons:
1) At this price range if they would have given IP68 water resistant it would have been great.
2) Slightly heats up after continuous usage.
3) very few times UI doesn't respond very quickly like how it does it in normal times.
4) poor call quality, I'm facing regular call disconnects. Not sure it's mobile or network problem.

Finally after exchanging my OnePlus 7 after using for 4 years upgraded to this. Hoping for another long-lasting performance from OnePlus.
Read more"}, {'name': 'nandhan', 'title': 'its not a bad phone, its not perfect either.', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 20 April 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'null', 'review_body': "so before i start, I've been using Samsung phones for the past 8 or 9 years. I already like the one UI and the perks that come with it. Now i booked S23 and then realized the fact that it is a bad deal for a phone that was already worth a lot of money. Now I' not saying this phone is also worth your hard earned money. this has its flaws and a lot of people here have already pointed out many of it . Yes the camera processing sucks(sometimes), yes the video quality is meh(compared to other flagships), yes it sucks not to have wireless charging and many flaws follow the suit.

The unit i received is working absolutely fine and has no heating issues or jittering or any thing else(physically and software wise my unit is fine till now). The phone takes just 25 mins to get to 90-100% from 20-25% charge. The screen is an E4 panel but its is damn good. The battery life (until and unless u push it really hard) is absolute top tier. I'm a person who attends office meetings through phone most of the times. this thing has an solid battery life that will last u a day and then some. The in-hand feel is good but you really have to be careful as it has a glass back that has ZERO grip. The sound is really good (quality is ok, bass is meh, loudness is 11/10) and it actually feels like stereo speakers.

Now if u ask me if this phone is worth 60000, it is not. PERIOD. And u shouldn't buy 8GB version as it is a even worse deal. You can buy iPhone 13,14 or S23 if u have good exchange offer.(but then u'll have to buy a charger, back cover... all extra which i don't appreciate).

I would recommend this if u have money to spend, else U can buy 11R which is actually a steal for that price.

I gave 5 stars becoz the phone thts in my hands is perfectly working and is of great use to me. it hasn't shown any glitches or software issues either (no hardware issues too). i just hope this thing lasts for a couple of years and it doesn't turn to a sucker with updates coming.
Read more"}]

name: Mi 10000mAH Li-Polymer, Micro-USB and Type C Input Port, Power Bank 3i with 18W Fast Charging (Midnight Black)
reviews:
[{'name': 'Anish Anurag', 'title': 'Your Reliable Power Source on the Go', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 24 July 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 20000mah', 'review_body': "The MI Power Bank 3i with a massive capacity of 20000mAh has proven to be a game-changer in my daily life. This portable powerhouse has become my go-to solution for keeping all my devices charged and ready to go, earning it a well-deserved five-star review.

Pros:
1. Huge Capacity
With its impressive 20000mAh capacity, this power bank offers abundant energy to charge my devices multiple times. Whether it's my smartphone, tablet, or even my wireless earbuds, the MI Power Bank 3i has more than enough juice to keep them running throughout the day.

2. Fast Charging Technology
The built-in fast charging technology is a standout feature of this power bank. It efficiently charges my devices in no time, saving me valuable minutes and ensuring I stay connected and productive even during busy days.

3. Dual USB Ports
I love the convenience of having dual USB ports. It allows me to charge two devices simultaneously without any compromise in charging speed. It's perfect for keeping both my phone and tablet powered up during travel or while working on the go.

4. Sturdy Build Quality
The MI Power Bank 3i boasts a sturdy and durable build quality. Its sleek metal casing not only looks elegant but also offers excellent protection against accidental drops or bumps, giving me peace of mind when carrying it in my bag.

5. LED Battery Indicator
The LED battery indicator is a practical addition that lets me check the power bank's remaining charge at a glance. This feature comes in handy, ensuring that I never run out of power unexpectedly.

Cons:
1. Slightly Heavy
Given its high capacity, the power bank is slightly heavier than smaller models. However, the extra weight is a minor trade-off for the extensive charging capabilities it provides.

Conclusion:
In conclusion, the MI Power Bank 3i 20000mAh is an outstanding power source that I can always rely on. Its huge capacity, fast charging technology, and dual USB ports make it an essential companion for my busy and tech-dependent lifestyle.

The sturdy build quality and LED battery indicator are thoughtful touches that add to its overall convenience and user experience. While it may be slightly heavier, the reliable and efficient performance of this power bank more than compensates for it.

For its exceptional capabilities and reliable performance, I wholeheartedly give the MI Power Bank 3i 20000mAh a glowing five-star rating. Embrace the convenience and power it offers, and never worry about running out of battery again. This power bank is undoubtedly a worthy investment for anyone seeking a reliable and high-capacity charging solution on the go.
Read more"}, {'name': 'Amazon Customer', 'title': 'Detailed Review - Must Read', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 2 October 2023', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 20000mah', 'review_body': "When I bought this Powerbank, I didn't found a detailed review regarding this but now as I have used and tested this Powerbank (20000 mAh variant) for 7 days, so I think I'm eligible to write a detailed review for this. Mainly I will write this review based on 4 points, build quality, charging time of powerbank, charging speed and battery backup. So let's start.

1. Build Quality : The build quality of this Powerbank feels quite solid & nice. Its sandstone design texture and round edges makes its grip solid in hands & quite comfortable to hold. Before this I used to have Redmi Powerbank (20000 mAh) which in comparison to this Mi Powerbank feels little ugly in terms of design and uncomfortable to hold. Mi Powerbank feels less wider, thinner & more premium as compared to the previous one.

2. Charging Time of Powerbank : The day I received this Powerbank, its LED indicators showed 2 LEDs blinking which means it had battery level between 25% to 50%. So before using it for the first time, I charged it fully using my standard 10W charger.
One should also note that charging time of Powerbank along with the adapter also depends on what type of cable you are using. Using an old type C cable will take more time to charge it, as current carrying capacity of the cable decreases with time due to frequent usage. Although my 10W adapter is quite old but I have a new type C cable which supports fast charging, so I charged my powerbank with this setup and it took around 8 hours to charge it fully. So you can expect to charge it from 0 to 100% in around 11-12 hours using a 10W charger. Whereas if you use a fast charger like 33 Watt, 65 Watt etc. then ofcourse the powerbank will charge at a faster rate but it will also affect the efficiency and thermals of the powerbank in a negative way in the long run, so keep that in mind.

3. Charging Speed Test : I tested the charging speed provided by this powerbank using 3 different type C cables to charge my 4000 mAh mobile device. Each time I charged my device to 80% using different cables (in second case I forgot to check & it got charged up to 90%) and noted the overall time it took to charge the device. All the results are attached in order as screenshots for reference.
In first case, I charged it with my 2 yr old type C cable which although supports fast charging but the results were not impressive. (Time 1h 43 min Pic)
In second case, I charged it with a new type C cable which came with my tws earbuds but it does not supports fast charging and the results were relatively better as compared to the first case. (Time 1h 58min Pic)
In third case, I charged it with the type C cable which comes inside the box of this powerbank and supports fast charging, and in this case I got the most impressive results. The device got charged to 50% in just 30 min, and 80% in 1h 8min. (Time 1h 8min Pic)
So, it shows that the cable also plays a very important role in fast charging your device which many people ignore.

4. Battery Backup : Other than the above mentioned test results I charged my mobile 3 more times but didn't noted the charging time. So all in all, till now I have charged my device to a total of 406% in 6 different rounds (80% + 94% + 80% + 44% + 82% + 31%) and still 3 LED lights of powerbank are blinking which literally amazed me considering the negative reviews I read about its battery backup before buying it.

So, overall I would say you can buy this powerbank if it suits your requirements and budget. Also if you buy this powerbank then I would suggest you to charge it fully before using it for the first time and test other things during that 7 days replacement period, so if you find any issues with it, you would be able to replace it. I used AccuBattery app to record the battery percentage & time it took to charge my phone.

P.S : Will update the review in future if felt the need to do it.
Read more"}, {'name': 'Swarnendu Chattopadhyay', 'title': 'A proven product.', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 19 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 20000mah', 'review_body': "It's an already proven product. Although, first couple of time the charge got drained extremely fast. But it's over a month now, and the performance is really stable now. I can charge my 6000mAh phone twice."}, {'name': 'Vijayaraju', 'title': 'Good product', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 19 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 10000mah', 'review_body': 'Super nice power charge good my mobile is two time charged'}, {'name': 'Onkar chand', 'title': 'Nice build quality', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 18 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 20000mah', 'review_body': 'Nice quilty big battery backup'}, {'name': 'Vv', 'title': 'Output is NOT c type', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 18 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 10000mah', 'review_body': "Read well before you buy. The input is using type c but output is only using USB cable and that's honestly very slow. The USB ports are the ones that will be used to charge your phone. The type b cable is honestly so archaic now when most phones are going type c

I bought it for it's speed but doesn't deliver on that."}, {'name': 'Amazon Customer', 'title': 'Gets the job done !', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 10 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 10000mah', 'review_body': 'IMPRESSIONS AFTER USE

The power bank has a solid build quality and is good looking.
It is portable enough to carry around and does not weight too much.
Supports 18W fast charging

Output ports: 2 x USB A

Input ports: 1 x USB C
1 x Micro USB

NOTE:

The USB Type C port functions only as an input port. It can only be used to charge the power bank. You cannot use it to charge your phone using a Type C-Type C cable

The cable supplied with the power bank is a Micro USB cable, and not a Type C cable. Since every phone now uses Type C port, this cable is useless.

I was able to fully charge my phone (with 4500 mAh battery) 1.5 times with the power bank.
Read more'}, {'name': 'Sumanta Dey', 'title': 'One of the best products arround here üòä‚úåÔ∏è', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 8 March 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Colour: BlackSize: Pack of 1Style Name: 10000mah', 'review_body': 'One of the loveliest product on Amazon. I am using this product over 1 year. It is serving really well it has a good capacity of battery and it charges my phone with 4300mah battery twice. It also charges my trimmer and smart band once after that. It is really tempting product. I am happy to have it.'}]

[{'name': 'prashant', 'title': 'Very Good Purchase! Vibrant and Smooth: Classmate Octane Gel Pens Shine!', 'review_date': 'Reviewed in India on 4 February 2024', 'product_category_purchased': 'Size: 5 Count (Pack of 1)Pattern Name: Classmate Neon', 'review_body': "I recently purchased the Classmate Octane Gel Pens from Amazon, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. The blur color ink combined with the neon body adds a vibrant touch to my writing experience. From jotting down notes to doodling, these pens have quickly become my go-to choice.

One of the standout features of these pens is their smoothness. The gel ink glides effortlessly on paper, delivering crisp and consistent lines every time. Whether I'm writing on regular paper or thicker cardstock, the ink flow remains flawless, resulting in a professional finish.

Additionally, the ergonomic design of the pen ensures comfortable usage, even during long writing sessions. The rubber grip provides excellent control and reduces hand fatigue, making these pens ideal for both students and professionals alike.

Furthermore, the durability of the pens is commendable. Despite frequent use, I haven't encountered any issues with ink leakage or smudging. This reliability gives me the confidence to carry them wherever I go, knowing that they will deliver exceptional performance.

Consider adding new refills for re-use

In conclusion, the Classmate Octane Gel Pens exceed expectations in terms of color vibrancy, smoothness, comfort, and durability. They have certainly earned a permanent place in my stationery collection, and I highly recommend them to anyone in search of high-quality gel pens.

The ZEBRONICS Zeb-Bro Wired Earphones come in a sleek design and are available in multiple color options, including Black, Blue, Green, Red, and White, allowing you to choose the one that suits your style.

In conclusion, the ZEBRONICS Zeb-Bro Wired Earphones offer decent sound quality and a comfortable fit, making them suitable for everyday use. However, the durability concerns surrounding the wire strength are worth considering. If you prioritize longevity and robustness in your earphone choice, you may want to explore other options. Nevertheless, if you handle them with care, these earphones can provide an enjoyable audio experience at an affordable price point.
